subject: re letter of credit preference swap transaction
body: the special protection under the bankruptcy code is not limited to swap section e protects margin payment and settlement payment which are made by or to a commodity broker forward contract merchant stockbroker financial institution or security clearing agency and the definition of swap agreement for purpose of section g includes commodity swap but your point is well taken because there seems to be no special protection for agreement that involve transaction covered by different subsection or that involve some transaction that are covered by the special protection and some that are not this issue may be even more important outside the letter of credit context there are special exemption from the automatic stay in section of the bankruptcy code for setoff under swap agreement and commodity contract but like section these exemption are in separate subsection and do not clearly provide for setting off transaction covered by one subsection against transaction covered by one of the other subsection or against transaction not covered by the exemption at all i can imagine setting up netting arrangement with several stage of netting both to take maximum advantage of the exemption in the bankruptcy code and to get a clear picture of the credit exposure with a particular counterparty first you would net all the transaction covered by each subsection then you might net the transaction covered by the different subsection then you would net the resulting number against transaction not covered by any of the exemption perhaps you do that already please let me know if you would like to discus this subject in more detail

body: john a dangerous environment is brewing on the trading floor we have very large position and people are becoming more frustrated with the work environment uncertain about future employment and now with new information about lay golden parachute i am concerned that not everyone may act in the best interest of the company hero or zero attitude or at a minimum may not be in the best frame of mind to trade i hate to suggest it but do you need to reduce the people allowed to take risk for the company similar to what wa done when we sold hpl the general feeling is that everyone at the top is taking care of themselves and the little people that have been making the money for the company are left out in the cold i also suggest that you move quickly to ensure appropriate compensation for key trader into next year i know the first move i suggested would have the effect of reducing morale further but this group ha a lot of risk on for people that may not be commited to enron this may be too drastic action at this point but i think it should watched closely

subject: sempra v enron
body: in september i sent you all a summary of the fact at issue in the abovereferenced lawsuit since that time several development have occurred first the trial date wa moved from october to november we have no reason to believe that we will not go to trial on the th we expect the trial to last from day to week judge ira gammerman will try the case there is no jury the second development deal with the proposed summary judgment motion mentioned in my last email summary judgment on liability and damage have been filed and the plaintiff have responded we have filed reply to their opposition paper in addition the plaintiff filed a crossmotion for summary judgment a to liability we filed opposition paper to this motion new york practice differs somewhat from texas practice to the extent that we have no firm date for a hearing on these motion although we are attempting to get a hearing before the trial date the judge ha complete discretion a to whether to hear the party motion for summary judgment before the start of trial the third development relates to the plaintiff theory of the case it seems clear from the paper filed in response to our motion for summary judgment that the plaintiff are finetuning their case to focus on the contract size distribution requirement arguing that the type of coal supplied by enron whether crushed or not could never meet the contract size distribution requirement the plaintiff make this argument in simple term and when argued a such it ha some appeal however it is enrons position that the contract language is ambiguous and the better and much more complicated approach advanced by the defendant is that the subject coal could and would have met the size distribution requirement issue of whether the contract are installment contract also play heavily in this analysis fourth since the last email on this matter we have learned that the plaintiff are seeking million in damage from enron this is approximately half of the amount of the contract damage cap lastly we finally received a response from the plaintiff to the settlement proposal we made in june the plaintiff have offered to resolve this matter for a cash payment by enron of million in the alternative the plaintiff have proposed a business alternative which is currently being investigated additionally there is some discussion of mediation in the limited time remaining before trial should you have any question about this case or should you need any further information please call me

subject: re your blurb for the recruiting web site
body: tony wow i dont think so i thought i would rewrite yours and correct some of the factual error if you disagree please write me back i moved from our houston office in to calgary and in wa named president of the canadian operation we went from a small gas marketing shop to the dominant natural gas trader and originator in canada it wa absolutely awesome i had the time of my life we built the business with very little supervision from houston into a major contributor to enron corp bottom line these day a many people know we are using the same trading and risk management skill that we learned in the energy business to create liquid tradable market in bandwidth pulp and paper coal and many others so our newer people still have the chance to do what i did in canada and help build revolutionary new business what a lot of people dont realize is how dominant our trading and risk management presence is in natural gas and power the opportunity our outstanding and the challenge will test the best mind out there these business are interesting and very complicated with a million different variable to figure out ranging from the weather to the level of gas storage in montana to how to move power from new york to south caralina you cant put gas and power on a truck or store them in a warehouse like other commodity it not like trading bond where you sit around and try to figure out what the fed is going to do it ha much more complexity and if you like trying to solve complex problem and your good at itget down here we need you john callout quote enrons not a place where you can hide if you cant get it done you wont fit in but if you can and you work hard youll get noticed youll excell youll get paid and were going to love you

body: jeff janice and i have been working on a deal with fred lagrasta that involves entering into a crude oil purchase agreement their lawyer ha come back with the following request which janice ha asked me to run by you they want to delete the arbitration provision or at the very least delete the waiver of the right to recover attorney fee they claim that this conflict with an indemnity clause in the agreement for nonperformance which allows for recovery of attorney fee they want to delete subsection e of the submission to jurisdiction clause which contains a waiver of the right to claim immunity from suit execution attachment or other legal process can we give on these point they owe u back payment on financial swap that we have done with them and the purpose of entering into this purchase agreement is to be able to offset what they owe u under the swap with what we owe them for the crude that we purchase it a long story a to how we ended up here but suffice it to say that this is our only hope of getting them to recognize the swap and honor their obligation under the swap so if there is any way taht we can accommodate their request to get the deal done that would be great carol

subject: esa government negotiation corrected
body: disegard previous email we reached a conceptual agreement with the government representative on sunday night the main point are rationing loss defined methodology giving distribution company recovery over the next month of rationing loss realised from june until the end of rationing in recovery includes financial compensation immediate funding of through bndes with brazilian government fund loan liquidated over the year period a tariff increase are realised funding scheduled by december th elektro ebitda impact of approximately r million or u million corrected number in second email aprilmay mae settlement market will settle under current rule due to prerationing condition confirming the procedure used on elektros book impact of approximately r million or u million parcel a for the future all noncontrolable cost to which ldcs are subjected to including power purchase sector charge are passed through to final tariff either using a tracking account mechanism or by aligning adjustment date with the ldc tariff revision date tracking account will be subject to financial compensation from the date cost are incurred until the effective pas through and collection eliminating a major risk for the distribution sector elektro ebitda impact forward of r million or u million a had been considered in the plan this methodology represents major risk mitigation going forward a the initial power supply contract are renewed starting in parcel a from the past min parente ha agreed to the concept recovering non controllable that were not passed through to tariff since late using the same methodology agreed to for future recovery and ha a dedicated team from the federal attorney general office targeting a final solution in ten day elektro impact is r million or u million in the proposed mechanism for recovery is after the month for the rationing loss we are currently finalising a memo of understanding and the government team is winding up the settlement with the generator in order to finalize the term of the overall agreement min parente ha committed to resolving the open issue affecting investor in the power sector these agreement represent a major step forward significantly improving the value of our business by solving the pending issue for the rationing loss thus eliminating the annex controversy the mae should function normally allowing u to operate eletrobolt and settle against the pool total amount for the sector represent about r billion or u billion at the current rate our team ha led the sector negotiation for month since the rationing and have been instrumental in convincing the government of the need for implementing these change

subject: california update p3 52901
body: hertzberg and keeley announced that they are filing a petition with ferc to rehear the april th decision regarding price cap after going to dc and meeting with several ferc member they decided to file for a rehearing their filing asks that the order should be in affect around the clock instead of just during stage that the actual cost be tied closer to the pricing of the product and anyone that exceeding the costbased pricing system have a penalty hertzberg and keeley had a press conference today at pst question included the impact of today ruling and how it would affect plan b hertzberg replied he wa not sure he also indicated that they support the feinstein bill and if the lawsuit or the rehearing effort do not work legislation is the last chance for price cap hertzberg also indicated that he wa getting to the point where ca may just say no to price that are too high via buyer cartel

subject: surety bond issue
body: below is a summary of the surety bond issue that i believe we need to resolve in order to feel comfortable accepting it a a form of collateral to secure a counterpartys obligation with respect to physical power purchase and sale transaction determine whether an issuer can refuse to honor a draw made under a surety bond if after issuance it determines that the bond wa issued in violation of the appleton statute what type of legal comfort should we receive from the issuer at the outset to get comfortable that the bond wa validly issued and is enforceable against such issuer determine the proper minimum credit rating that should apply to the issuer in the form of bond that we were given the now therefore language in the third paragraph is not acceptable determine what can be said in it place to establish the necessary linkage back to the transaction covered by the confirmation make sure that the bond can be drawn down no matter what type of event of default occurs even if such event is not related to the transaction that the bond reference the notice of claim language need to be written more generically to accommodate this doe credit need a prebankruptcy trigger that would require reliant to convert all outstanding bond into lcs or cash collateral if so what would this trigger be let me know if you have any additional issue i will be discussing some of these with our outside counsel shortly carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: re your blurb for the recruiting web site
body: tony wow i dont think so i thought i would rewrite yours and correct some of the factual error if you disagree please write me back i moved from our houston office in to calgary and in wa named president of the canadian operation we went from a small gas marketing shop to the dominant natural gas trader and originator in canada it wa absolutely awesome i had the time of my life we built the business with very little supervision from houston into a major contributor to enron corp bottom line these day a many people know we are using the same trading and risk management skill that we learned in the energy business to create liquid tradable market in bandwidth pulp and paper coal and many others so our newer people still have the chance to do what i did in canada and help build revolutionary new business what a lot of people dont realize is how dominant our trading and risk management presence is in natural gas and power the opportunity our outstanding and the challenge will test the best mind out there these business are interesting and very complicated with a million different variable to figure out ranging from the weather to the level of gas storage in montana to how to move power from new york to south caralina you cant put gas and power on a truck or store them in a warehouse like other commodity it not like trading bond where you sit around and try to figure out what the fed is going to do it ha much more complexity and if you like trying to solve complex problem and your good at itget down here we need you john callout quote enrons not a place where you can hide if you cant get it done you wont fit in but if you can and you work hard youll get noticed youll excell youll get paid and were going to love you

body: piras certainly got the whole market wound up ive seen a wave of producer selling for the first time in two month over the past two day most selling cal off the back of pira pira certainly command a lot of respect these day too much probably the problem with all these bull spread ie fh is the thought process in natty is that if jan is strong just think what happens when you get to march and run out of gas the spread game is very different than playing crude these spread havent moved for the past point runup you know there were guy bullish this market trying to play it with spread and havent made a penny just to clarify pira said bcf y on y for z that seems hard to believe on am cc mkts cmon give me some credityou think ive been doing this this long wout know who doing what im i ny for the pira conferencethyre pretty bearish cal and will be interesting to see ifwhen the producer start to take that to heart here one for you to think about of piras riteie production gon na be up bcf by year end doe increased deliverabilty mean these winter sprds in producing areasie janapr and the fact the mkts gon na be more concerened about running out in march than in jan suggest big invererese will not be sustainable but will happen only on a weather event be curoius your thotsi maybe thinking too much but make some sense to mehave a good weekend johnny pira say decm prod up bcf y on y

subject: re data standard
body: please take me off your email list jennifer green on pm aedc member cc data standard dear aedc member one of the most interesting development in the economic development arena is the creation of the aedccuededac site selection data standard this standard long in the making provides an opportunity for economic developer and their customer to have one common mean of presenting and examining data adoption of the standard promise real time saving and more effective economic development decision a community will be more comparable than ever before a copy of the standard is attached so that you can take a look at it to see how the data standard can be made to work for you there are table in the standard presented in an excel format the tab at the bottom of the page will access the additional table you can assemble your own data for the data standard table or you can use the service of acn the american community network aedc ha entered into a strategic partnership with acn to provide much of the data necessary for the standard acn will provide data and provide future update of the standard to aedc member at a discounted rate it is your call a to which approach work best for you adoption of the standard promise great change for the economic development profession they should be of particular advantage to the many area that have great economic development opportunity but which havent received the consideration they deserve the standard are a great way to tell their story if youd like more information on the use of the standard look for notice of upcoming course offered with aedcs national seminar on the standard and their use paul lawler aedc ssdstf datatables june xl

subject: holiday party canceled
body: i know that this is a difficult time for all of u with everything going on inside the company a well a in the world around u we have been carefully considering whether a holiday celebration is appropriate this year to be honest employee feedback ha been mixed many viewed the holiday party a a unique opportunity for u to come together a enron employee to share the spirit of the season others felt a holiday party would be improper given the company current circumstance after weighing these point of view we have ultimately decided to cancel the allenron holiday party that wa scheduled for december given what ha transpired over the past month it could be considered imprudent for enron to incur the expense of such an event i regret that this action is necessary because i recognize that your hard work throughout the year merit a holiday celebration and so much more we will attempt to find other more appropriate way to recognize your outstanding contribution a we move into the holiday season ken lay

subject: re market opinion about aga
body: interesting observationbut im not sure i agree i think consensus opinion is that anything under tcf is very dangerous entering the winter a month ago analyst were predicting we would end the injection season with around in the ground with the most recent aga those projection seem to be closer to with supply of gas very inelastic to price in the short and medium term you must look at the demand side of the equation the market is trying to price out the right amount of demand mostly through lost industrial load and fuel switching such that supply will be stored rather than burned each aga number is another data point a to whether nat gas is high enough to price out enough demand to reach a comfortable level in storage entering the winter a low aga number indicates we havent priced out enough demand and the market must go up certainly the throw a curve in the bull argument but the number may be a function of very mild weather a four day holiday weekend and reporting noise rather than indicative of a structural shift in the supplydemand equilibrium well know a lot more a the next two week number come out if we get two low injection watch out enron north america corp frank hayden enron pm john cc market opinion about aga john i think the aga are not a important to bull a to bear in the beginning of the season aga were very important in framing the bull case the current expectation is that we will go into the winter under stored i dont believe any additional aga news can significantly change that expectation however i believe bear a evidenced today will feed more heavily off of bearish aga news than bull will off bullish aga news at this juncture i believe that the most potent bullish news ha to come from the physical market and weather i hope you dont mind me expressing my view point on this issue thanks frank

subject: re bammel lease question
body: jim this issue is adequately covered in the lease and related document which were blessed by you and the storage reservoir engineer why this late expressed concernif you have fact which lead you to believe that aephpl is operating this facility contrary to safeindustry standard or regulatory requirement or is otherwise endangering the facility related facility or the integrity thereof please call me asap sincerely barbara jim pm brian barbara n cc john j thomas a bammel lease question i wa wondering if the bammel lease to aep contains any operating parameter to protect the integrity of the facility the question arises from the fact that bammel had about bcf of remaining capacity when enron turned the facility over to aep we believe their plan is to max inject in june which would reduce the remaining capacity to around bcf it could become a challenge to keep injection under the remaining bcf level during the reaming month of the injection cycle enron always operated the facility with the understanding that a gas in place volume greater than bcf could create a high enough pressure to jeopardize the safety of the wellhead casing and some of the abandoned well we would not want the texas rrc to question the safety of the bammel facility from the other end of the perspective if the gas in place is taken below bcf their is a high probability of watering out the outer well and the facility itself

subject: enron announcement
body: car rental option for enron traveler rental car contract for have been awarded to national car rental primary and alamo rentacar secondary the intent of these agreement is to consolidate and leverage enrons total car rental spend to achieve the most favorable rate and nonpricing provision ie insurance national car rental due to it service level availability and total value proposition ha been awarded primary status and is recommended a the first choice for enron traveler need alamo rentacar a sister company to national ha been awarded a contract reflecting a secondary status due to it subject: re bammel lease question
body: jim this issue is adequately covered in the lease and related document which were blessed by you and the storage reservoir engineer why this late expressed concernif you have fact which lead you to believe that aephpl is operating this facility contrary to safeindustry standard or regulatory requirement or is otherwise endangering the facility related facility or the integrity thereof please call me asap sincerely barbara jim pm brian barbara n cc john j thomas a bammel lease question i wa wondering if the bammel lease to aep contains any operating parameter to protect the integrity of the facility the question arises from the fact that bammel had about bcf of remaining capacity when enron turned the facility over to aep we believe their plan is to max inject in june which would reduce the remaining capacity to around bcf it could become a challenge to keep injection under the remaining bcf level during the reaming month of the injection cycle enron always operated the facility with the understanding that a gas in place volume greater than bcf could create a high enough pressure to jeopardize the safety of the wellhead casing and some of the abandoned well we would not want the texas rrc to question the safety of the bammel facility from the other end of the perspective if the gas in place is taken below bcf their is a high probability of watering out the outer well and the facility itself

body: today we announced the appointment of jeff mcmahon a enrons chief financial officer in my continued discussion with the financial community yesterday and today it became clear that this move wa required to restore investor confidence jeff ha unparalleled qualification and a deep and thorough understanding of enron he is already on the job and hard at work on the issue before u andy fastow will be on a leave of absence from the company jeff had been serving a chairman and ceo of enron industrial market he joined enron in and spent three year in the london office a chief financial officer for enrons european operation upon returning to the u jeff wa executive vice president of finance and treasurer for enron corp in he wa named president and chief operating officer of enron net work i know all of you are concerned about the continuing decline in our share price i am too and we are working very hard to turn it around appointing jeff a cfo is one important step in that process but most of the solution involves just continuing to do our job with excellence the fundamental of our business are strong and i think the market will begin to see that a we continue to perform please join me in giving jeff your full support and thank you for all of your continued hard work

subject: ee billingsettlements function
body: john the current functional reporting structure of billing settlement through ee pose near term and long term tactical risk we feel jeopardizes our ability to meet our goal and objective currently deal capture and risk analysisreporting report through sally beck however settlement and billing report through evan hughes ee a such the reconciliation process wes colwell and wade stubblefield is held hostage to any piece that break down in this structure we ena are able to control the progress and performance of deal capture and risk reporting we are making progress on these front we are completely out of the loop re current state of affair on the billing side other than it just doesnt work we are also out of the loop in assuring the proper approach and solution are being implemented according to anthony dayao and other there are approximately different billing system that feed csc we outsource billing to csc apparently billing group spent several month attempting to scope out the process and future requirement this wa done in conjunction with union finosa i think that approximately mm ha been spent to date on this effort w union finosa anthony is this accurate union fin recently provided the group with a proposal and anthony ha negotiated day to review and respond apparently billing wanted to go forward with just one week of comment bottom line this doe not appear to be the proper approach to ensuring that we are solving our comprehensive billingsettlement issue a well a near term necessity proposed solution billingsettlements should report to sally beck dotted line to ena and ee ee can maintain customer interface through call center and logo on invoice convene an immediate meeting with evan hughes anthony dayao et al to summarize current state including union fenosa retain accenture or kpmg to fully scope out current reality v business need implement action plan to address long term solution v short term necessity until we can resolve this i am afraid that decision are being made without full consideration of enas view of business need and ena can not be accountable for when and if we can ever provide monthly reconciliation and flash to actuals a we all recognize unless you can reconcile the book you really dont have a legitimate business john could we convene a meeting if necessary for you to address these issue i will be out next week and would like to leave knowing that we are on the path to getting this resolved thanks rogers

subject: new curve generation methodology
body: i am changing the way the curve is generated starting in jan to better replicate seasonal fundamental there are convincing argument a to why the summerwinter spread should tighten over time however in the previous methodology they blew out for instance summerwinter in cal wa while cal wa i have added a seasonality dampening function that both contract the summerwinter spread and applies a premium to the electric load demand month of july and august over time the formula for the curve remains the same except for a premium lookup for the month a well a for the year these premium are a follows jan feb mar apr may jun jul aug sep oct nov dec these premium start in jan on wednesday jan settled the spread wa marked at the spread wa marked at in the old methodology jan jan jan in the new methodology jan jan jan the only change in the formula is from month x month x year lookup on year on year table to month x month x year lookup on year on year table lookup on month premium table the seasonality premium will change over time and i will let you know when i change them

subject: re your blurb for the recruiting web site
body: tony wow i dont think so i thought i would rewrite yours and correct some of the factual error if you disagree please write me back i moved from our houston office in to calgary and in wa named president of the canadian operation we went from a small gas marketing shop to the dominant natural gas trader and originator in canada it wa absolutely awesome i had the time of my life we built the business with very little supervision from houston into a major contributor to enron corp bottom line these day a many people know we are using the same trading and risk management skill that we learned in the energy business to create liquid tradable market in bandwidth pulp and paper coal and many others so our newer people still have the chance to do what i did in canada and help build revolutionary new business what a lot of people dont realize is how dominant our trading and risk management presence is in natural gas and power the opportunity our outstanding and the challenge will test the best mind out there these business are interesting and very complicated with a million different variable to figure out ranging from the weather to the level of gas storage in montana to how to move power from new york to south caralina you cant put gas and power on a truck or store them in a warehouse like other commodity it not like trading bond where you sit around and try to figure out what the fed is going to do it ha much more complexity and if you like trying to solve complex problem and your good at itget down here we need you john callout quote enrons not a place where you can hide if you cant get it done you wont fit in but if you can and you work hard youll get noticed youll excell youll get paid and were going to love you

subject: importantto all domestic employee who participate in the enron
body: if you are a participant in the enron corp saving plan please read this very important message we understand that you are concerned about the timing of the move to a new saving plan administrator and the restricted access to your investment fund during the upcoming transition period scheduled to take place beginning at pm cst on october and ending at am cst on november we have been working with hewitt and northern trust since july we understand your concern and are committed to making this transition period a short a possible without jeopardizing the reconciliation of both the plan in total or your account in particular remember that the enron corp saving plan is an investment vehicle for your longterm financial goal the enron plan will continue to offer a variety of investment opportunity with different level of risk a always we advise you to review your overall investment strategy and carefully weigh the potential earnings of each investment choice against it risk before making investment decision that are aligned with your longterm financial plan and your risk tolerance for that reason it is critical that all trade among your investment fund be completed by pm cst friday october before the transition period begin

subject: senate switch affect energy bill outlook
body: at pm houston time today senator james jeffords rvt will announce that he is switching from the republican party to become an independent voting with the democrat if this happens control of the senate will switch to the democrat which will give the dems a majority and control of the senate all committee chair would become democratic and the dems would control the legislative agenda energy bill california bailout possible investigation of who influenced the cheney plan etc in a profound ideological shift sen murkowski r ak would be replaced by sen bingaman dnm a chair of the senate energy committee when bingaman take over the senate energy committee expect pipeline safety issue to again come to the fore bingaman is a strong proponent of tough pipeline safety regulation particularly in the wake of the carlsbad explosion last year and will likely insist on strict safety requirement in the cheney energy bill the recommendation for loosening regulation for oilgas drilling coal and power a well a incentive for new generation contained in the cheney bill are likely to be heavily revised in favor of more conservationoriented measure the tax bill will likely be downsized particularly if jeffords make his switch immediately the timing is important because the senatehouse conference on the bill must be appointed immediately all presidential appointment would be controlled by the dems this is significant because of the large number of subcabinet level appointment that need to be approved at the same time republican are trying to convince sen zell miller dga who already vote republican to switch to the republican party if this happens it will cancel out the expected jeffords move initial report are that miller will not switch one other caveat jeffords ha pondered a switch in the past and then flaked out but if jeffords go through with it and miller stay put the balance of power in washington will be tipped in favor of the democrat

subject: re fund view
body: very usefulthx keep me posted caroline am john mike jennifer cc per fund view hi all the fund are trying to figure out what the play is for next year major divergence of opinion most everyone we talk to take a macro view dwight anderson from tudor think anything above is a sale from the perspective of shut in industrial demand he belief that between no industrial basic industry type can operate he track all the plant closure similar to what elena doe in mike robert group but it seems on a more comprehensive level jen it would be good for fundamental to track this number do some scenario analysis on it under various economic condition like recession i will try to find out what his total number for turned back gas is just ammonia is a little more than bcf which doe not seem all that meaningful but the total may bring u back into balance for the summer while he a seller above hed also be a buyer of summer at lower level he firmly belief in increased production in still ha day short based on his relationship with the producing community although i personally think that q see little i know that the fundamental group is tracking these number from the producing community and ha seen no increase in q over q and is doubtful for any in q over q he really belief theory on product being out of whack heatgas crudepropane jim pulaski is a bull period he really like april and may on the storage scenario i agree that we try to build storage in april but with the backwardation out there what is the incentive a well with lower baseloads for the summer deliverability should not be an issue i am torn on this one catequil new fund paul touradji used to be with tiger they do the same analysis a dwight just starting up and one of their mandate is to be long nat gas through vol or outright harvard not really sure of the view yet they have not been active in gas just crudeproducts they like buying cheap vol because they do not have mtm issue they like to look out in the calendar year the other people we are starting relationship with in the new year are moore capital global advisor caxton paloma partner kingdon renaissance program trader just so you know the name a i get to know them better ill try to fwd on thought regularly have a great holiday ill be here next week caroline

subject: are you ready2go
body: are you readygo have you ever experienced problem accessing the network remotely when traveling on business or when trying to work from home on your laptop would you like someone to test and customize the dialup access on your laptop before you head out of town on your next trip we have identified a need and are now supplying a new service for enron wholesale service and eb employee it just for you and it called readygo this new service ha been established to test modify and update the dialup software on your laptop how it work a calendar ha been created on itcentral at httpitcentralenroncomdataservicesreadygo you can go to the site and schedule a time that is convenient for you then you will need to bring your laptop to our testing site either at acd or ebb we will examine your system update your software if needed and even customize it for the next location you will be traveling to well also provide a brief training session in accessing the network remotely with your laptop if you are interested in participating simply access the web site and schedule an appointment thank you for your time

subject: please read important information for participant in the enron
body: due to current business circumstance on november enrons board of director adopted an amendment to the enron corp saving plan the amendment includes the following change which became effective on november saving plan contribution that are deducted from your november paycheck will be matched by enron in cash rather than enron stock the cash match will be placed into the fidelity freedom fund the default fund for the plan after november enron will no longer match your saving plan contribution a an exception the company will continue the union matching contribution to the plan the saving plan ha always permitted employee to place their contribution in enron stock or one or more alternative investment option effective immediately diversification within the plan will also be allowed regardless of your age from company contribution account this remove the restriction for all employee under the age of to diversify the company contribution held in their account these account include all prior company contribution qnec and company match account to move fund on the web choose saving planrestricted employer acct transferreallocation from the drop down menu on voice response choose request for fund transferreallocation of your restricted employer account this will allow you to move money from the four formerly restricted account company matching union matching prior matching and qnec to avoid phone delay we recommend that you access your account through the web at httpresourceshewittcomenron or through benefitsenroncom

subject: deutsche bank
body: rod here are their credit issue in the crossdefault language that want to add language that basically say that even if a crossdefault occurs unless the nondefaulting determines in good faith that performance by the defaulting party of it obligation under the master is endangered then no cross default is triggered in credit event upon merger we had commented that instaed of the materially weaker standard we wanted to specify that it meant being rated below bbb by sp do you feel strongly about this alos we usually have language that say that if an event like merger occurs and the transferee provides collateral to the other party in an amount that is satisfactory to such party then a credit event upon merger is not triggered they did not want to add this carveout are you okay with this they want a separate event of default that get triggered if a mac below bbb occurs we requested that it be out in the collateral threshold language they are saying that for operational purpose they can not agree to netting they want a a category of eligible collateral governmental security with a maturity of le than year valued at in the csa if a dispute occurs with respect to either the calculation of exposure or the calculation of the value of any colateral in connection with a party request either for the transfer or return of collateral normally the following procedure apply a the disputing party notifies the other party of the nature of the dispute by the close of business on the day following the day that the collateral request wa made b the undisputed amount is transferred to the party making the request c the party attempt to resolve the dispute by the resolution time and if a resolution is not reached a recalculation of the exposure is made and market quotation have to be obtained we normally say that the resolution time is business day after the dispute notice is given db want to shorten this period to business day after the dispute notice is given which give the party le time to resolve the dispute on their own what do you think if a party hold cash a collateral we normally say that interest earned is transferred on the first day of the month they want to change first to last let me know what you think i wa hoping that some of these you could resolve with your counterpart at db carol

body: sorrysorry sorry havent had internet access at home for past week much easier to write these at home a when im done trading i dont want to look at my computer for november very neutral cash is impressive agree shutins switching and some weather are making market look more like equilibrium think with cashfutures at cent xz look crazy a soon a z becomes prompt the fear factorrisk premium of it will decrease and the whole winter will come off like your hj trade hard to see it really being worth cent at settlement been buying a lot of yy cantango a i think next summer will be a piece but longer term gas story still very real and customer know it wouldnt be surprised to see go to i think x ha some room to go up but not a lot dont want to play the market from the long side a been burned before trying to get long a market that is still in a downtrend seems like the curve will just keep rolling down with each expiry all the winter month might settle a such the best thing to be short is jan

subject: re technical help for interviewing trader
body: in regard to gas what signal do you for in determining your view no right answer some example are strength or weakness in financial basis and index market customer flow cashfutures spread technical analysis storage projection price action etc what resource do you use to formulate a price view goal is to see how much he analyzes the fundamental of the market weather doe candidate look at weather model such a american european and canadian operational run or doe he just subscribe to a weather service storage ha he built an aga forecasting model or doe he just wait for others to tell him projection production ha candidate dug into eia production data company specific drilling result or state specific such a texas railroad commission report end of season storage number ha candidate built a longer term forecast of where we end up in storage give example of complex transaction youve structured for a customer where is storage now relative to history what is the highest and lowest level weve been at in past year what are your short medium and long term view of gas market what major basis change have occured in the market over the past year what do you expect in the next how should a storage operator decide whether or not to inject on any given day in regard to derivative in order of difficulty what are deltagammatheta if you buy a put spread is your delta positive negative or zero is swap price equal to simple average of future contract if interest rate go up what happens to option price all else equal what is the value of a european call expiring in month if corresponding future are trading what happens to delta of an option if volatility increase tom on am john cc re technical help for interviewing trader john thanks a million for your input i wa wondering if you could outline some good response to these question with your interpretation of a good response or point to consider this will be a great resource for other interviewer thanks again tom wilbeck

subject: bc election result analysis
body: below is a brief summary of the bc election result and some analysis into the new political party implication a the new bc energy strategy further develops we will provide a more detailed followup report executive summary new democratic party sweep election opposition within newly elected party possible campbell to consider dividing bc energy and mine portfolio ndp election a expected the ndp wa wiped out by the liberal party at this point the liberal have secured of riding a riding is the bc terminology for an open seat while the ndp ha won only three counting ha not yet been completed in another riding though it is expected to go to the liberal a well the final riding in victoria is disputed due to approximately absentee ballot the ndp is currently trailing the liberal by vote this dispute is not expected to be resolved until may when all absentee ballot will be counted no other party secured seat though source report that the green acted a a spoiler for the ndp in several case opposition party source speculate that it is possible that due to the poor showing by the ndp a new opposition might form within the rank of the liberal approximately five former member of the social credit party which wa disbanded in the early s were elected to liberal seat source state that it is possible that these member could reform the social credit party within the legislature to act a an opposition to the liberal government source also state that richard neufeld a a former reform party member might choose to join this opposition if it form though there is no read at this time a to how likely this is to occur otherwise due to the landslide campbell liberal government is expected to have a carte blanche to do whatever it want minister of energy mine campbell is expected to focus on forming his cabinet first there reportedly is a considerable pay gap between the cabinet and the backbencher mlas meaning that there is likely to be considerable jockeying for position however there are obvious contender including richard neufeld who is likely to be named energy minister source report that campbell intends to reduce the size of the cabinet somewhat though the size of the reduction is not known at this time however he reportedly may be planning to split the energy and mine portfolio off from northern development forming two separate position it is also possible that energy and mine could be combined with other position to form a larger natural resource portfolio

subject: var
body: this memo follows up on our discussion this morning with respect to the million of increased var that the board allocated to rick buy and jeff skilling i propose the following million be allocated to ee and therefore remove ee position from the wholesale gas and power group this ha already been done move the control and decision making of million of var each to the trading head of north america lavorato and europe sherriff with respect to north america i intend to create a group called the cross commodity trading group which will warehouse the million of var and use it a it see fit i will run this group and currently be the only employee this will start out a an administrative structure to use if we need to throw more var at certain position i see the individual trading group staying within their var limit however i do see the need for a true cross commodity group that would search for low risk high probability trade accross the commodity that we trade this structure may help to start u down this path please let me know what you think john

subject: re your blurb for the recruiting web site
body: tony wow i dont think so i thought i would rewrite yours and correct some of the factual error if you disagree please write me back i moved from our houston office in to calgary and in wa named president of the canadian operation we went from a small gas marketing shop to the dominant natural gas trader and originator in canada it wa absolutely awesome i had the time of my life we built the business with very little supervision from houston into a major contributor to enron corp bottom line these day a many people know we are using the same trading and risk management skill that we learned in the energy business to create liquid tradable market in bandwidth pulp and paper coal and many others so our newer people still have the chance to do what i did in canada and help build revolutionary new business what a lot of people dont realize is how dominant our trading and risk management presence is in natural gas and power the opportunity our outstanding and the challenge will test the best mind out there these business are interesting and very complicated with a million different variable to figure out ranging from the weather to the level of gas storage in montana to how to move power from new york to south caralina you cant put gas and power on a truck or store them in a warehouse like other commodity it not like trading bond where you sit around and try to figure out what the fed is going to do it ha much more complexity and if you like trying to solve complex problem and your good at itget down here we need you john callout quote enrons not a place where you can hide if you cant get it done you wont fit in but if you can and you work hard youll get noticed youll excell youll get paid and were going to love you

developing by early in the last week of november the strong western storm will push into the central u bringing widespread rain and snow behind the system another surge of below normal temperature subject: small venture usa
body: russell i think i should give you a little background on small venture bill perkins and i have a strong personal and professional relationship he is an extremely creative individual whalley actually commented on him today a someone who think outside the box bill actually sat in a bar four year and said the next tradeable market would be bandwidth he ha been successful in the gas business when he ha had someone to filter his idea a such he provides an informal consulting role to enron he throw out idea and every once in a while he come up with a great one he pointed out an anomalous pricing occurence in the option market a market i normally dont follow closely that i translated into a multimillion dollar trade for enron in return i have agreed to have enron intermediate his trade within reason i want to emphasize that continuing this relationship should be considered a high priority i am willing to accept some of the credit risk exposure a a cost of doing business bill understands his role a an independent in the market and performs the right riskreward trade for someone with finite capital i place very high confidence in bill not conducting high risk trade having said that we certainly need to monitor his credit exposure and continue to require lcs just understand that he is at a different level of sophistication that any other noninvestment grade counterparty i understand there wa some concern in regard to the transco z spread option he traded he wa absolutely right about the valuation and we on the trading desk knew it a well there are a couple isolated product that enron doe not do a good job of valuing because of system limtations this wa one product our spread option are booked in excel using option pricing model created by the research group the problem with these model is that they are strictly theoretical and dont take into account gas fundamental price limitation for instance it is le probable though not impossible for a transport spread from a production area to a market area to go within variable cost than the model predict thus it is necessary to apply a correlation skew curve on top of the overlying correlation used obviously we have this function in our pricing model i wa not aware this methodology had not been transferred to the valuation model this ha since been changed fortunately these incident tend to be extremely rare a very few noninvestment grade company trade these type of product finally on friday bill wanted to do a trade that reduced his exposure to enron i gave mike maggi the go ahead to do the trade without consulting credit i do not believe that i acted out of line in approving this trade considering the circumstance if you believe differently please advise thanks john

body: thanks andy for pulling this together hi everyone it sheraton kalouria i just returned from a vacation in ibiza spain where i must say i thought frequently of our quarter class and not just because i drank too much the exposure to interesting diverse personality reminded me how enriching getting to know all of you wa quick update im living alone in los angeles like a pingpong ball im on the left coast again give me time no doubt ill be back in new york but i dont expect that to happen any time soon a a i have year remaining on my contract with nbc where im the head of the daytime programming unit and b i bought a house in the hollywood hill and i now have too much furniture to be contained in even the very largest domestic minivan it hard to believe how much time ha passed and it really great to hear how well everyone is doing after year with abc i jumped at the chance to lead a department even though it wa mired in third place for many year in the rating since my arrival im happy to report weve gone from worst to first on the strength of our two soap opera day of our life and passion my marketing skill were put to the test when we launched an unprecedented novelization of a soap which ultimately landed on the new york time best seller list for week i even had the good fortune of interfacing with marc sznajderman on some nbcicom matter here are the vitals sheraton kalouria palo vista drive los angeles ca h m w if any of you are in the los angeles area please give me a callid love to catch up also the tonight show with jay leno tape right here at nbc in burbank and i would be happy to assist you with vip ticket to a taping if youre interested because email can be altered electronically the integrity of this communication can not be guaranteed

subject: td waterhouse ipo center is accepting conditional offer
body: td waterhouse is now accepting conditional offer to purchase share of vca antech inc which is expected to price on to read the preliminary prospectus filed with the sec and place a conditional offer follow these step login to your account click on trading ipo center ipo offering in the list of current offering select the offering you want and then click on the continue button important information reaffirming your conditional offer once the registration statement is declared effective by the sec we will contact you via email to notify you of the effectiveness of the registration statement and the price a determined by the managing underwriter this normally occurs on the day prior to the first day of trading if you still wish to participate you will be required to respond to u by am et of the following business day to reaffirm your previously submitted conditional offer please note that the email notification will likely be sent after the market close please ensure that you have provided an email address that you are able to access after that time you may change your email address at anytime via the update email function within the ipo center if it is not possible to check your email after market hour you may reaffirm your conditional offer following effectiveness by going to the ipo order status within the ipo center choosing the conditional offer you want to reaffirm and clicking reaffirm conditional offer if you fail to reaffirm your conditional offer within the specified period your conditional offer will automatically be cancelled conditional offer are accepted once reaffirmed at the offering price determined by the managing underwriter after the registration statement becomes effective please note that reaffirming a conditional offer doe not guarantee an allocation of share thank you td waterhouse investor service inc member nyse sipc

subject: re rebuttal
body: confused what are you disagreeing with me in regard to demand destruction jennifer on am john cc rebuttal i am definitely a bigger fan of the crude complex for the next few month agree the defcon bubble ha burst for natgas disagree about the demand destruction i think some demand is just permanently gone i cheaper btu in asia pacific and plant just wont run here anymore but i think that we are underestimating the structural change in energy demand just a the economy is le dependent on heavy industry for it health energy demand is changing since just about everyone missed the boat on the increased power demand a a result of silicon valley i think we dont have a good handle on what the driver of the new power generation really areso what im saying is that industrial demand will weaken demand in service based industry will increase also energy is a much smaller component of the cost structure in service industry also i think in people had sticker shock they couldnt have imagined gas but now that volatility and higher price are firmly entrenched in their mind they will find way of running their factory also they will budget for these price instead of see ng week nevada power price hike affecting casino increase of when asked the implication for missed earnings and their plan for demand conservation one casino official replied were in the bright light business i dont believe the economic doom and gloom first of all no one want a repeat of the recession which wa much worse outside of the u every central bank in the g ha or will cut rate this week the u will follow suit or it will have a very expensive dollar which will blow export with all of the monetary slack consumer credit will not tighten and thus buying will continue witness the lack of destruction in big ticket item purchasing heavy manufacturing is contracting but this is not everything productivity gain are strong the economy is becoming more service based and traditional industrial barometer are not telling the whole story finally i am london and it is not doom and gloom over here well there my cent jen fraser enron global market fundamental

subject: assistance for former employee
body: many of you have friend who are no longer with the company so we wanted to provide you an overview of continuing effort to assist enrons former employee career service last december enron established a website to assist former employee identify job in houston and throughout the united state only former enron employee and potential employer can access the site httpcareerservicesenroncom on this site former employee can post their resume for approved employer to view view job posting receive update and information on career and community service available to them a of january more than company had been approved to view resume company recruiter had logged on more than time to search for candidate more than job had been posted on the site financial assistance the greater houston community foundation the greater houston community foundation ghcf in collaboration with the united way of the texas gulf coast the houston area urban league crisis intervention of houston and career and recovery resource have established a fund to provide dedicated support for former enron employee ghcf offer former employee counseling service and help them work with mortgage company landlord and utility to defer monthly bill while they are out of work if you are interested in making a taxdeductible donation to the ghcf please call or mail donation to ghcf at post oak place suite houston tx check should be made payable to greater houston community foundation and designated for the enron employee transition fund to receive assistance former employee can call or outside houston line are open hour a day seven day a week enron exemployee relief fund account a former employee ha established the enron exemployee relief fund account at the humble community bank visit the website at httpwwweerfacom for more information or to make a donation former employee can submit grant request to mdpc transitional assistance program memorial drive presbyterian church ha created a transitional assistance program open to both member and nonmember who need assistance reentering the workforce right management consultant offer a series of twoday workshop for former employee on topic such a career assessment and evaluation job search communication and managing in a time of change request for limited and discretionary shortterm financial assistance will be accepted from those who have participated in this program mdpc will offer a holistic approach to reentering the workforce including family counseling and stress management for more information contact memorial drive presbyterian church at ext

subject: natural gas origination
body: our natural gas business continues to benefit from effective account management and resource allocation focused on identifying and responding to the need of our varied customer in order to keep our organization optimally structured and to facilitate additional growth we are making the following change producerwellhead group the current midmarket origination and wellhead pricing activity currently within the central and eastern gas region will be consolidated with the derivative group under fred lagrasta this will create a single business unit focused upon the need of the producing industry within the eastern u the producer focus in the western u and texas will remain unchanged reporting to mark whitt and brian redmond respectively strategic asset development laura luce will move from her role in the central region to lead an effort focused strictly on identifying and entering into longterm strategic arrangement within the central and eastern region this initiative will focus on a limited number of selected market that provide strategic opportunity for partnering in asset development asset management and optimization this effort will continue to work very closely with the regional lead central origination and midmarket frank vickers will continue his current role in the eastern region and will assume the leadership role for midmarket and origination activity in the central region there will be no change to the west and texas origination group headed respectively by barry tycholiz and brian redmond please join u in congratulating fred laura and frank in their new role louise john

subject: internet distributed ipo
body: john i spoke with witcapitals investment banking and equity syndication group today regarding internet distributed ipo confirming some of our earlier research the internet is used a one of several distribution channel for an ipo not the sole distribution channel this is not to say that a internet distributed ipo can not be done however although witcapital said they would not do one witcapital emphasized the need for a large stock distribution to instutional investor in an ipo to allocation is typical to this end the bank ha hired an institutional sale force which us the telephone rather than the internet to sell in witcapitals opinion an ipo with to institutional allocation and to retail allocation is an optimal structure which maximizes the price obtained by the issuer such higher price would presumably more than offset the higher cost of a typical ipo versus an internet distributed ipo in addition wicapitals opinion is that the liquidity and trading evironment would be healthier for a typical ipo versus an internet distributed ipo which would give the stock support in a secondary offering whereby the issuer is unloading it holding please let me know if you would like for u to do additional research on this topic regard kyle kettler x

subject: jeff mcmahon named cfo
body: today we announced the appointment of jeff mcmahon a enrons chief financial officer in my continued discussion with the financial community yesterday and today it became clear that this move wa required to restore investor confidence jeff ha unparalleled qualification and a deep and thorough understanding of enron he is already on the job and hard at work on the issue before u andy fastow will be on a leave of absence from the company jeff had been serving a chairman and ceo of enron industrial market he joined enron in and spent three year in the london office a chief financial officer for enrons european operation upon returning to the u jeff wa executive vice president of finance and treasurer for enron corp in he wa named president and chief operating officer of enron net work i know all of you are concerned about the continuing decline in our share price i am too and we are working very hard to turn it around appointing jeff a cfo is one important step in that process but most of the solution involves just continuing to do our job with excellence the fundamental of our business are strong and i think the market will begin to see that a we continue to perform please join me in giving jeff your full support and thank you for all of your continued hard work

subject: computer virus
body: there are several new computer virus that are spreading rapidly on the internet the virus target window computer user and arrives in email with various subject line like fwdpeace between america and islam the message also contain attachment that can be directly executed by clicking on the attachment the most prevalent virus ha an attachment named wtcexe if you ever get an email with an attachment that ha an executable file you should never launch the attachment at enron these file type are blocked automatically from entering our environment however if you would connect to an external email service ie hotmail aol yahoo etc while using an enron computer or attached to the enron network you could infect our internal computing system if you do the virus could cause significant issue and prevent some of our system from working effectively if you ever get an email that you are not sure about simply delete the email and contact your resolution center to let them know how you obtained the message it is much better to be safe than sorry a we will be able to track down the origin of the virus in the enron network thank you enron global technology

subject: na system
body: i thought i would try to summarize our meeting this week and document a list of agreed apon task the unify system is on the brink of disaster and everyone agrees that we have huge business risk if it blow up sally and beth are going to document the step we are taking to maintain the system and minimize the chance of a failure everyone understands that this is a difficult task but it sound like it should be a high priority the database to run the gas book take way too long and is leading to long hour on the part of our back office staff beth is moving from sunos to sunsularis which should allow u to address the problem we have contractor working on this and we are expecting it to take week once this project is complete we can add hardware and reduce the time problem the trader need better real time management tool that ultimately combine their physical and financial trade together and identify their real time risk tds wa a system that wa built to help this however it doe not meet all the trader need this ultimately need to be a system that is commissioned by the trader to meet their need phillip allen is going to prepare a list of trader need in consultation with all the gas desk head after this beth should try to come up with a plan to get a system that meet all the trader need the power system is unstable and fails on a regular basis this is leading to long hour on the part of our back office staff beth ha made progress in this area and we are going to monitor the improvement over the next to week to see if the improvement prove to be working steve natt is going to put a plan together that meet with kevin prestos approval that address our need with respect to allrequirements deal and volume management deal in the east there will be no more business trip to london somewhat kidding portland ha issue with speed do to the fact that we still run their book through an interface with houston john lavorato will talk to tim beldon and beth to determine whether it worthwile to put server in portland since tim wa not in the meeting john will make sure we are covering all his need

body: my suggestion mountain jackson hole aspen banff are a nice respite from the houston summer san diego or the baja peninsula are also nice can combine golf fishing and all kind of outdoor activity more exotic locale could include dominican republic cabo san lucas championship course in vicinity virgin island bermuda im not a big fan of la vega although there is some good golf in the area focus should be on i improving communication across business unit im surprised by the number of people on this email that i dont know well perhaps presentation by each business unit reviewing and h ii identifying opportunity to profit from volatility in commodity and financial market iii create a road map strategic plan for the balance of and full year i love mountain climbing lived in switzerland for four year and am happy to organize beginner course andor expedition with trained mountaineer great team building therapy otherwise im always up for golf deep sea fishing go kart racing kayaking skeet shooting paint ball occasional offsites are a great way to buildmaintain morale and make sure everyones on the same page regarding strategydirection call if you want to discus in more detail im serious about organizing mountain climbing mlm

subject: re data standard
body: please take me off your email list jennifer green on pm aedc member cc data standard dear aedc member one of the most interesting development in the economic development arena is the creation of the aedccuededac site selection data standard this standard long in the making provides an opportunity for economic developer and their customer to have one common mean of presenting and examining data adoption of the standard promise real time saving and more effective economic development decision a community will be more comparable than ever before a copy of the standard is attached so that you can take a look at it to see how the data standard can be made to work for you there are table in the standard presented in an excel format the tab at the bottom of the page will access the additional table you can assemble your own data for the data standard table or you can use the service of acn the american community network aedc ha entered into a strategic partnership with acn to provide much of the data necessary for the standard acn will provide data and provide future update of the standard to aedc member at a discounted rate it is your call a to which approach work best for you adoption of the standard promise great change for the economic development profession they should be of particular advantage to the many area that have great economic development opportunity but which havent received the consideration they deserve the standard are a great way to tell their story if youd like more information on the use of the standard look for notice of upcoming course offered with aedcs national seminar on the standard and their use paul lawler aedc ssdstf datatables june xl

subject: florio response to ferguson
body: xsender xmailer qualcomm window eudora version fri nov bill marcus jim caldwell julian bill mike florio fwd wohin gehen wir i forgot to hit the reply to all button when i responded to rich fri nov rich ferguson mike florio wohin gehen wir cc eteam rich i like the idea but im not sure im a very good test case after all i have been branded a the last living defender of command and control regulation socialist central planning and everything else bad that youve ever thought of could the role of calpower be better filled by an existing forprofit company eg enron no way any private seller would have all the same conflict a the utility and then some but michael shame is interested in the idea of auctioning off all or part of the retail franchise in san diego since sdge doesnt seem to want to be in the business anymore i have been pushing a corenoncore distinction such a you suggest although i havent been bold enough to suggest a nonprofit procurement entity i did push this idea for pges gas procurement back in the bad old gas accord day but the idea got nowhere then what ive talked about is including the retained at least for now generation in the core portfolio along with some contract and some spot havent developed any number yet i would certainly encourage shopping the idea seller will probably hate it because this entity would have more market buying power than even the current udcs but so what thats what we want right id suggest running it by bill julian for a political straight face test but i would guess hed like it and it would be a perfect vehicle for rps which we would certainly like to revive let keep exploring this mike at pm you wrote folk i am growing increasingly worried about future public policy oversight of utility power purchase given the current conventional wisdom that more long term purchase should be made i have been promoting the notion that the default power portfolio should be maintained by a new nonprofit quasipublic entity with revenue guaranteed by the puc rather than by three separate iou subject or not to reasonableness review your comment on this notion are eagerly sought purchasing power for default customer the recently proposed ferc decision essentially put california back where it wa in there appears to be near universal agreement that the iou should enter into long term power purchase agreement and limit exposure to the spot market a you recall the brpu reached the same conclusion decided how much should be purchased held the auction etc and then ferc blew it up after deciding that the state avoided cost estimate were wrong ferc appears now to agree it made a mistake and essentially order u to start the process all over again however the proposed order make no mention of state oversight of utility purchase but at the briefing held last wednesday for bowen and legislative staff ferc staff made it clear that they were not mandating any alternative to replace the must sellbuy requirement that they were eliminating presumably the state could still mandate the iou buy in the px or whatever and still comply with the ferc order a long a the utility remain regulated by the puc the state can control their power purchase the problem is that after screwing around for ten year there is now enormous pressure to let the utility do what they will a result that i fear would be bad for consumer and bad for the environment on the other hand there no time nor stomach for repeating the brpu process my preferred solution is the establishment of a new not for profit utility that would make power portfolio decision for default customer let call it calpower the three existing regulated utility would no longer sell energy at retail calpower decision would be subject to whatever public policy condition the legislature andor the puc chose to impose however some kind expedited review process would allow calpower to be very nimble in the power market and recovery of their revenue requirement would be guaranteed direction of calpower could be by political appointee elected representative or some combination my fantasy is a governance structure similar to calpers in which broad legislative guideline are interpreted by a board of director and implemented by experienced trader compared to the present structure in which default portfolio are designed by three different forprofit utility calpower appears to have the following advantage the nonprofit structure eliminates all financial conflict of interest in portfolio design and ensures optimum implementation of public policy goal it ensures equitable treatment of all customer statewide with price difference reflecting market reality rather than differing purchase criterion by each utility it allows calpower to be a nimble in the market a any other commercial trader by allowing the puc or other state agency to participate in portfolio design issue upfront rather than requiring lengthy after the fact review calpowers disadvantage appears to be that it requires yet another new statechartered nonprofit organization politician appear intent on blaming the two they have already and returning to the old utilitycentric system rather than risk their neck by proposing solution that they then would be responsible for obviously there are many question and detail to be worked out which customer would be default customer my option would be to declare all customer under kw permanent default customer green or other marketer could participate through contract for difference but physical power would be acquired for all these customer by calpower customer kw would be on their own what is the relationship with the puc with the legislature could the role of calpower be better filled by an existing forprofit company eg enron how are the benefitscosts of existing utility generation asset and pp contract shared etc is this concept attractive enough to be worth pursuing the next step would be to get a group of interested party together to put some meat on these bone and float the idea seriously perhaps even get some draft legislation on paper to shop around interested let me know regard rich
