subject: thank you a letter from bruce arena and april heinrichs
body: dear u soccer family a another year come to a close we wanted to thank each and every one of you for your support the last month have been extremely successful for both our senior national team and our youth national team and promise to be exciting on all front the u men national team qualified for our fourth straight world cup setting the stage for an exciting tournament while the u woman took their first step toward the woman world cup by building on the successful launch of the wusa this past summer in the year ahead our men will be focused on the koreajapan world cup where we will square off against portugal south korea and poland in june we are confident that with your support and the right preparation we will have a successful tournament for the u woman our goal are no le tangible with preparation for the woman world cup qualifying becoming the focus of our activity for our youth national team we saw our u and u men team qualify for fifas biannual world youth championship in those age bracket in our under woman national team will have the opportunity to compete in the first ever fifa woman world youth championship with qualifying scheduled for may in trinidad tobago and the actual tournament set for canada in august this is real progress for the development of the woman game and we expect our team to successfully qualify and then compete for the title of this firstever event in all of the world championship we have the opportunity to measure ourselves against the best team in the world and that help to motivate our athlete but it is the support we receive from our u soccer family and fan that inspires our player again thank you for your support throughout the year and into the future we look forward to a successful sincerely bruce arena april heinrichs head coach technical director head coach technical director u men national team u woman national team to end your membership in ussoccerfancom please visit httpmembershipussoccercommemberunsubscribespsmsmid and fill out an unsubscribe request thank you for supporting u soccer

body: colonial oak lane spring texas january john lavorato regarding energy trading position i am writing to you to express my desire to be apart of the wholesale power and gas trading operation with netco i have been working for rogers herndon in enron wholesale service on the option desk in this role i have modeled the power option that are embedded in the various deal done through enron energy service with large industrial and commercial client in addition i profitably managed the position and priced deal for structurers and originator i realize that now is a difficult time but am confident that i would make an excellent addition to your team for several key reason proven experience in the financial market and direct trading experience in various market including electricity and natural gas mortgage backed security u treasury security foreign exchange eurocurrency and eurodollar deposit team player and high work ethic successfully balancing trading opportunity with managing risk solid portfolio management and risk management experience in electricity and mortgage banking five year direct experience in trading risk management structured product and marketing of electricity for the united state actively involved in the physical market and strong understanding of the western grid experience trading otc forward and option at major hub in other nerc region such a cinergy entergy ercot nepool and pjm worked for both unregulated power marketer and regulated utility extensive experience in derivative and structured product ability to effectively work with marketer pricing and structuring deal for industrial and commercial end user of energy strength in mentoring junior trader thank you rick j wurlitzer home work email home work

subject: california update 51101
body: the extraordinary session is expected to close early next week after the governor ha signed sb x a power plant siting bill yesterday the governor signed bond financing bill sb x once the extraordinary session is closed a new extraordinary session is expected to be opened immediately however source report that no one is certain if the bill from this session will have the same number in the next session the legislature reportedly is trying to arrange so that the bill will not have to be heard again in committee the mou still doe not have a sponsor governor davis hope to reach a deal with sempra for the state to purchase san diego gas and electric transmission asset he reportedly feel that by having deal in place with socal and sdge enough momentum might be added to push the mou through the legislature he then could go to the bankruptcy court and propose adding pges asset since he would have two of the three piece in place the validity of this logic seems questionable at best source are skeptical that adding sdge to the mou would increase the chance of the deal going through the legislature also the governor ha claimed to be close to having a deal with sdge for several week but such a deal ha not yet been finalized the governor stated that he will have a sponsor for the mou by next week when the bill will be introduced the mou might be introduced in the legislature then amended to indicate a lesser amount for the transmission asset purchase this still would not assure passage since so many legislator reportedly are against the mou the windfall profit tax bill ha not been set for hearing on the assemble floor state legislature elizabeth hill published a report earlier this week regarding an analysis of state revenue the report stated that revenue for this year would be b le that wa expected in january not including electricity cost she predicts that ongoing state program will have to be cut by approximately b moody ha put california credit rating under review for another downgrade source report that moody sp and mbia have all informed california that the only way the state will improve it credit rating and look better to investor is to get out of the power business and resolve the undercollected

subject: agency rider
body: debra a debra and i discussed we are currently preparing a gisb contract for gpu service company a agent for ______ i mentioned to debra that when we have a counterparty who is represented in transaction by an agent we work to include the attached agency rider in the master agreement these rider include rep and warranty relating to the agent authority a well a an acknowledgment by the principal relating to same i propose that you all consider the attached rider when preparing master agreement in an agency context to the extent that the counterparty is amenable i strongly urge you to propose that the principal enter into the contract on it own behalf and that the contract merely recite that the agent is authorized to enter into transaction pursuant to the agreement for and on behalf of the principal this is the approach i am going to try with gpu if an agent represents multiple principal try to enter into a separate master with each principal however to the extent the counterparty absolutely refuse this approach at the very least i would include the rider and get acknowledgment from the principal if there are multiple principal try to get a separate agreement with the agent for each principal a opposed to one master with an agent on behalf of numerous principal to avoid question about allocation of transaction and credit exposure please feel free to follow up with any question or comment i have also attached for your reference a memorandum i prepared some time ago regarding various issue to consider when dealing with an agency relationship leslie

subject: ansi_x341968qenron01s_entry_into_global_metals_market
body: this morning we announced an offer to acquire londonbased mg plc one of the world leading metal marketer for million we have been monitoring the global metal market for several year and we believe that now is the right time to enter this billion market we are confident that our successful business model which we have proven in the natural gas and electricity market give u a tremendous advantage in a market that i s undergoing fundamental change our offer to acquire mg plc ha been unanimously recommended by mg plcs board of director and we expect to close the transaction by early third quarter of this year following shareholder and customary regulatory approval mg plc is a leading independent company in global nonferrous metal tradin g and marketing and the only such company that is publicly traded headquartered in london with major office in new york and frankfurt mg pl c ha employee in country it is the world leading copper merchant one of the top three merchant of copper concentrate and nickel and a leading european merchant of recycled metal other product that mg plc market include aluminum lead tin zinc brass and stainless steel this transaction provides enron with access to new customer and enables crossmarketing opportunity we plan to sell enron energy product to mg plc customer and offer bundled product combining metal and power outsourcing enron will help producer and consumer manage the risk inherent in volatile raw material and energy market and we will improve commodity price for both buyer and seller mg plcs existing marketmaking capability and market knowledge provid e an immediate platform upon which to overlay enrons proven ability to offer innovative ecommerceenabled service to commoditybased industry our new metal business will be integrated into our wholesale business by enron europe ceo john sherriff who will work closely with enron net work ceo gr eg whalley

body: appreciate the opportunity to listen in i wa unable to view the slide show though can you either email or mail it to me thanks john piasio stephen fi on am cc fw natural gas production and price outlook conference call ole_obj natural gas production and price outlook conference call ole_obj salomon smith barney natural gas conference calldoc energy research group analyst access conference call natural gas production and price outlook hosted by bob morris and michael schmitz oil and gas exploration production analyst date time friday february rd am est dialin u international replay reservation x u international accessing presentation go to httpsintercallsslcontigocom click on conference participant enter event number x enter the participant name company name email address click continue to view the first slide of the presentation key point natural gas storage level appear to be on track to exit march at roughly bcf compared with just over bcf last year at the end of the traditional withdrawal season meanwhile domestic natural gas production should rise this year largely dependent upon the extent of the drop in rig efficiency or production added per rig nonetheless under most scenario incorporating numerous other variable such a the pace of economic expansion fuel switching and industrial plant closure it appears that storage level at the beginning of winter will be near or below last year bcf level thus it appears likely that the heat will remain on natural gas price throughout consequently we believe that many ep share will post solid gain again this year spurred largely by mounting confidence in the sustainability of strong natural gas price natural gas conference calldoc

subject: re data standard
body: please take me off your email list jennifer green on pm aedc member cc data standard dear aedc member one of the most interesting development in the economic development arena is the creation of the aedccuededac site selection data standard this standard long in the making provides an opportunity for economic developer and their customer to have one common mean of presenting and examining data adoption of the standard promise real time saving and more effective economic development decision a community will be more comparable than ever before a copy of the standard is attached so that you can take a look at it to see how the data standard can be made to work for you there are table in the standard presented in an excel format the tab at the bottom of the page will access the additional table you can assemble your own data for the data standard table or you can use the service of acn the american community network aedc ha entered into a strategic partnership with acn to provide much of the data necessary for the standard acn will provide data and provide future update of the standard to aedc member at a discounted rate it is your call a to which approach work best for you adoption of the standard promise great change for the economic development profession they should be of particular advantage to the many area that have great economic development opportunity but which havent received the consideration they deserve the standard are a great way to tell their story if youd like more information on the use of the standard look for notice of upcoming course offered with aedcs national seminar on the standard and their use paul lawler aedc ssdstf datatables june xl

subject: meeting with tana
body: mark and sara tana came into my office last night and seemed to be very upset about how the other legal assistant were treating her especially susan bailey and also about the fact taht susan bailey wa going to be part of samanthas training and that this wa a surprise to her on the latter issue i explained to her that given that the susans were involved in the day to day routine it made perfectly good sense for of them to handle this part of samanthas training especially since tana wa now out of the day to day stuff i am very concerned that tana is going to interfere with susans training process given her attitude toward the whole thing which i really feel is ridiculous the only possibly valid point that she might have is the fact that we didnt tell her that this wa going to work this way but even so again it tanas way of not be able to let go and not being a team player i explained to her that both she and tana had different role to play with respect to samanthas training and that they both were important and taht in my opinion susan wa more than qualified to handle this part of samanthas training on the first point i told tana that the only way that this group is gong to work better is through communicating to each other i firmly believe taht there are side to this and taht all of them are guilty of treating the other at time in a not so pleasant way tana of course will not admit this i have no answer for this issue other than the fact that i am tired of hearing about why they cant get along i also told tana taht it wa my perception that susan bailey ha been under alot of pressure given her increased workload and other thing and taht that could explain her attitude which even i have noticed ha been a little different lately im letting the both of you know about this because i dont want any of this to negatively impact samantha to the extent that it can be avoided carol

subject: stand tall
body: i just finished having lunch with tobin and he filled me in a bit about this morning meeting i dont know how you reacted if you were upset etc but i wanted to offer this up if you were struggling with the situation whatever happens and whatever is said about your move dont ever lose sight of the fact that in every aspect of this situation you conducted yourself in the best and most open manner possible in no way can or should your conduct be called into question bearing that in mind any criticism that wa expressed within the meeting this morning wa beyond inappropriate i am sure it reflected much more poorly on the accuser than it did any of those being criticized furthermore just keep focused on what an incredible opportunity this move is going to be for you and all of the door it will inevitably open there isnt a doubt in my mind that you are bound for great thing you just have to seize the opportunity that will lead to that when they come along which is exactly what youve done keep your chin up and whatever you do dont doubt yourself or your action

subject: midback office objective
body: a near term goal for midback office commercialization is a follows first we need to determine what each piece is in the midback office that can be commercialized and how we would separate these different piece in other word how we separate risk reporting and general ledger and where we put it at enron how we put the physical gas nomination and power scheduling at the desk how we take the rest for gas and power andor financial and create processcoserviceco a a separate entity or within net work second once we know the different piece can we separate them from a system perspective i am assuming that separating people is straightforward third assuming we can separate thing how we communicate back to the other part in other word how we communicate information back to enrons sap system how we settle for enron if they want processco to do physical settlement how we receive information so we can deal capture and confirm etc all the linkage fourth how we create an agreement between processco and ew that defines payment service level term etc that can be a model for other company a well fifth how this all deal with commoditylogic and it business model sixth if we go alone or work with someone like arcordia after beth meeting finally how we originate these deal and charge for our service i know that alot of this is being done in different part on different time schedule but i would like to get it all pulled together soon in the following format a draft of a contract between ew and processco or net work also a clear picture of what system and function would be in this entity also a recommendation on how enron maintains it risk reporting and general ledger a well a physical noms and scheduling and where that stay in enron and how those function work with processco sheri thomas jeff harbert frank davis fred philipson and andrea crump are now full time reporting to tom on commercialization all have midback office experience and can help beth and sally with alot of this work before tom come back from his cruise at the end of next week let discus monday thanks gp

subject: re bmc update 1715
body: chaz and steve here the latest in a nutshell basically the testing is not fully completed even where we might have felt that it wa close because there is also a financial component which need to be exercised the tco part of the purchase decision a you know both randy matson and bob mcauliffe are out on vacation so getting a decision from them is not likely before christmas however it look like there ha been enough feedback tothrough them to surmise that bmc is not in the driver seat in either situation in a meeting today it became apparent that bmcs revenue opportunity with the net work organization is much lower than bmc ha projected to you at eb the primary opportunity for bmc in net work is for their schema manager tool and the rest of the opportunity look increasingly dim especially given the time constraint imposed in your situation still the net work team ha not completely ruled bmc out a a potential vendor but neither is there a commitment written or verbal to make a bmc purchase at this point i will be on vacation next week but will be checking in on monday the th and tuesday the th jennifer or i will keep you posted if we are able to report opportunity change in your favor i have sent you a paraphrased version of dougs most recent communication to me the overall message would apply fairly universally to the other net work team in question more testing but look like bmcs total sale opportunity to enron is not going to get to the amount necessary to get your deal done the issue mentioned in the other summary update note from yesterday still apply thank you jeff

subject: annex v
body: mark nothing ha changed since our meeting last week but here a quick summary for your convenience deliberation coma board for asmae which act a the clearinghouse for the mae issued deliberation directing asmae to do it accounting without applying annex v by oct the generator object because without annex v they are short instead short elektro and the ldcs object because failure to apply annex v ignores the contract which is registered with the mae and a long position will never be upheld deliberation further directs asmae to gather and supply to the generator and ldcs the information for application of annex v seven day prior to oct this is good because it give elektro the information it need to calculate the set off against the generator for it long position thus it is unnecessary for elektro to seek an injunction against asmae compelling the information letter to comaeasmae to preserve it position elektro sent a letter objecting to the comaes failure to direct asmae to apply annex v the letter confirms a list of information ldcs require for the calculation if the information is not provided or is delayed elektro will go to court to compel the information once it get the information elektro can go to court to force asmae to apply annex v prior to taking the set off elektro will seek an injunction to protect it asset from seizure by the generator under annex vi subsequently elektro will file a suit against the generator to enforce the contractual application of annex v two suit are being filed immediately to compel aneel to permit elektro to recover or pas through various cost increase pursuant to it concession agreement regard michelle

subject: please register to attend the enron management conference
body: a you know the enron management conference will be held wednesday through friday november at the westin la cantera resort in san antonio texas this ha been an eventful and challenging year for enron now more than ever it is fitting to bring enrons leader together after all it is up to our management team to lead our company through these challenging time together we will define enrons character and determine enrons destiny we have a great program planned for this year conference im delighted that general norman schwarzkopf will join u a a keynote speaker on leadership im equally pleased to welcome back gary hamel who will help u process the past year and prepare for future success a ive said before we are a company that continues to look to the future and there are many exciting thing in store for u i look forward to seeing you at this very important meeting regard ken lay note this year registration for the management conference will be conducted electronically below is a link to the online registration website along with instruction for navigating the site everyone must register by friday november httpwwwmplannerscomenron when you access the management conference online registration website enter your email address and password password enron in the specified box the first time you access the site you will be prompted to enter your first name and last name once completed click submit on the next page click sign up now to register you will be prompted to enter your basic information and make selection for your hotel room travel and preferred activity in the scroll box to the right you can review and print the conference agenda a list of activity a well a travel arrangement and other general information after you have entered the necessary information you can review your registration or simply log out your registration information will be automatically submitted once registered you can reaccess the site at any time to review or change previous election when reentering the site you only need to enter your email address and password if you experience any problem accessing the site please contact marge nadasky at
category: Logistic Arrangements (meeting scheduling, technical support, etc)

subject: ne pl for 1023
body: seabrook pl booking the mw seabrook position through for calender result in a positive million for background purpose ui ha a ownership interest in the seabrook nuclear facility total facility is mw the other owner of seabrook are a follows northeast utility they are driving the sale it is a condition on their coned merger great bay power they have announced their intention on selling new england power other minority owner small minority municipal iou owner the seabrook facility ha been on the auction block for the past month and given the uncertainty of the timing of the sale dana i felt it wa imprudent to book calender year until we knew with certainty that the plant asset transfer and associated state nrc and ferc approval would occur after remember contractually epmis mw ppa position terminates upon final closure of a ui sale of it interest with respect to millstone pilgrim and maine yankee nuclear asset sale the majority owner drive the sale process and minority owner generally almost always sell their interest at the same price a the majority owner with respect to uis interest in seabrook ui ha already informed u they intend on selling their interest along with the majority owner obviously the plant ha not yet been sold and i feel comfortable given a month approval process coupled with seabrooks politically sensitive location in new hampshire booking the mw position through icap pl given the huge regulatory uncertainty regarding the ultimate outcome of icap in ne dana is uncomfortable taking any of the million to income at this time basically our opinion is that the regulatory decision will either result in a default price of kwmo resulting in approx million postive pl or a default price of kwmo loss of million the icap decision ha once again been removed from the ferc agenda for next wednesday meeting this is the rd time that ha happened in the past month and indicates a lack of consensus at ferc given this ferc indecisiveness and the current situation in california and reliability issue in both the western and eastern u in general i am very concerned that ferc doe not have the political gut to pull the plug on icap or lower the default price to low penalty rate given this regulatory situation there is a chance we lose additional money and a chance we make additional money said another way we would likely use the entire million in icap s to completely hedge icap through the term of ui in addiiton there wa a ferc ruling regarding pjm icap today that said kwmo for pjm icap wa indeed market based and not market manipulated this coupled with fercs lack of decision for month on ne icap make u very uncomfortable the good news is we are not short pjm icap

subject: re consumption for for ge15
body: kevin im glad your clarified what information wa to be gotten out of the attachment a i wa scratching my head over that one i think your approach of reviewing the an existing project is a good one i know that mark f ha done some work on this issue see that attachment which we can build on i do have a concern about using montfort given that it is a cold weather turbine and a low wind site which can lead to an overstatement of power consumption depending on how the analysis is done that being said we will need to get an idea of the power consumption for the cwe and cwl but the immediate task is for fpl new mexico which we are thinking is a standard unit given that the cumulative load on paper per wtg is kw of which a majority is the yaw motor i would think that there is a low probability that all the yaw motor will be drawing in a pre synchronous mode at the same time therefore perhaps a statistical solution like taking the square root of the number of wtgs in the park time kw is a statically valid approach in determining possible peak power demand for a given period furthermore should this become an important issue for the owner i am sure some solution could be make in the wtg to mitigate peak power demand in the park so in summary my feeling is that we look at a noncw park to generate empirical comsumption data that can then be compared to the above statistical approach and see how they compare mark kevin cousineau am mark cc mark mark hollis consumption for for ge mark mark and mark i have reviewed the attached power curve and clearly it will not help in formulating an answer to your question i would like to ask mark fisher to look at a typical installation any one of our field site and give u data on kwh consumed by several turbine over a multimonth period with data arranged month by month perhaps one or two turbine at monfort would be the best because we can look at a whole year of data this would tell u what wa produced and what wa consumed in energy mark eilers what do you think regard klc mark ratekin pm kevin cc mark mark hollis consumption for for ge attached is the final power curve result from the tehachapi prototype which includes the power consumption the page wa scanned from the nrel test report if you have any question or need the entire document feel free to contact me best regard mark

subject: bammel lease question
body: i wa wondering if the bammel lease to aep contains any operating parameter to protect the integrity of the facility the question arises from the fact that bammel had about bcf of remaining capacity when enron turned the facility over to aep we believe their plan is to max inject in june which would reduce the remaining capacity to around bcf it could become a challenge to keep injection under the remaining bcf level during the reaming month of the injection cycle enron always operated the facility with the understanding that a gas in place volume greater than bcf could create a high enough pressure to jeopardize the safety of the wellhead casing and some of the abandoned well we would not want the texas rrc to question the safety of the bammel facility from the other end of the perspective if the gas in place is taken below bcf their is a high probability of watering out the outer well and the facility itself

body: dear mr lavorato i am writing you to express my dissapointment about how the whole aa issue with ubs wa handled i have been working for a year a an analyst in the gas risk management group in that period i learned a lot about risk and trading and eventhough sometimes we worked crazy hour i thought i had this incredible job and i worked with the best people in the industry how few of u get a chance like that i wa looking forward to my next rotation in the origination group when the whole enron scandal started happening even when we filed the bankruptcy i still knew that the trading group will survive and i wa right but i never thought that the management will so easily forget about the analyst and not even try to negotiate analyst salary with ubs that all of u knew were the lowest in the market and i am completely sure ubs knew that too but why would they pay u more when our own management did not stand behind u i remember the time when i wa working till pm or sometimes even longer but since i had this incredible group of people to work with i always thought someone would recognize that but it look like that it doe not matter anymore how much you work but who do you know mr lavorato i wanted to share this with you because i know that you can make a difference and that you always cared about the aa program eventhough it may be late for me it would be a great loss for the company if all these smart people start leaving many of them are the brightest individual i ever met and i think they are the future of ubs trading group i hope that you will at least think about what i said because i know that you have a lot on your mind i wish you a lot of success in this year sincerely anna kulic gas risk management

subject: important announcement regarding document preservation
body: a you know enron it director and certain current and former officer are defendant in litigation in federal and state court involving the ljm partnership enron ha employed counsel and they will represent enron and it interest in the litigation under the private security litigation reform act we are required to preserve document that might be used in the litigation accordingly our normal document destruction policy are suspended immediately and shall remain suspended until further notice please retain all document which include handwritten note recording email and any other method of information recording that in any way relate to the company related party transaction with ljm and ljm including but not limited to the formation of these partnership any transaction or discussion with the partnership or it agent and enrons accounting for these transaction you should know that this document preservation requirement is a requirement of federal law and you could be individually liable for civil and criminal penalty if you fail to follow these instruction you should know that enron will defend these lawsuit vigorously in the meantime you should not discus matter related to the lawsuit with anyone other than the appropriate person at enron and it counsel if you have any question please contact jim derrick at

subject: enron center south ec move backup plan
body: a backup seat and a backup computer have been assigned to you please read this communication in detail purpose net work ha developed a backup plan for possible work stoppage after moving to the new building a wider business continuity plan will be rolled out next year location large area of the th and st floor of the current building enron center north will be set aside for recovery purpose your name ha been put on the list and you will be notified once the seat assignment are finalized location will also be posted at the entryway on the th and st floor timing through november backup seat assignment will be announced a each trading group move to the new building the backup seat will be available at least to january st testing test time to try the backup pc and to familiarize yourself with your backup location will be announced by the it team a the location are finished telephone only regular phone will be available for those with speed dial phone the it team will download the number and leave them on a piece of paper at your seat assignment because the number change frequently we ask that you rely on keeping track of the number yourself and use the number list a a last resort other supply the it team is not responsible for nontechnical or special need if you rely on hard copy form address book etc you will need to be sure to leave appropriate supply when you test the computer or bring supply along if you are asked to move to your backup seat limited access the backup floor is not meant a a backup daytoday work environment to keep the equipment functioning and secure we plan to limit access except for test time and if we need to invoke the plan because of a work stoppage escalation procedure the plan will be a follows i during regular business hour a announcement you will be notified via the pa system if you need to move to the backup location or b no announcement if an obvious problem like a fire or power shutdown occurs for example all personnel with a seat assignment will be expected to make their way to their backup seat without notification ii after hour for after hour issue greeter will announce the move to the backup location a people arrive to work email and voice mail will also be distributed

subject: new curve generation methodology
body: i am changing the way the curve is generated starting in jan to better replicate seasonal fundamental there are convincing argument a to why the summerwinter spread should tighten over time however in the previous methodology they blew out for instance summerwinter in cal wa while cal wa i have added a seasonality dampening function that both contract the summerwinter spread and applies a premium to the electric load demand month of july and august over time the formula for the curve remains the same except for a premium lookup for the month a well a for the year these premium are a follows jan feb mar apr may jun jul aug sep oct nov dec these premium start in jan on wednesday jan settled the spread wa marked at the spread wa marked at in the old methodology jan jan jan in the new methodology jan jan jan the only change in the formula is from month x month x year lookup on year on year table to month x month x year lookup on year on year table lookup on month premium table the seasonality premium will change over time and i will let you know when i change them

subject: na system
body: i thought i would try to summarize our meeting this week and document a list of agreed apon task the unify system is on the brink of disaster and everyone agrees that we have huge business risk if it blow up sally and beth are going to document the step we are taking to maintain the system and minimize the chance of a failure everyone understands that this is a difficult task but it sound like it should be a high priority the database to run the gas book take way too long and is leading to long hour on the part of our back office staff beth is moving from sunos to sunsularis which should allow u to address the problem we have contractor working on this and we are expecting it to take week once this project is complete we can add hardware and reduce the time problem the trader need better real time management tool that ultimately combine their physical and financial trade together and identify their real time risk tds wa a system that wa built to help this however it doe not meet all the trader need this ultimately need to be a system that is commissioned by the trader to meet their need phillip allen is going to prepare a list of trader need in consultation with all the gas desk head after this beth should try to come up with a plan to get a system that meet all the trader need the power system is unstable and fails on a regular basis this is leading to long hour on the part of our back office staff beth ha made progress in this area and we are going to monitor the improvement over the next to week to see if the improvement prove to be working steve natt is going to put a plan together that meet with kevin prestos approval that address our need with respect to allrequirements deal and volume management deal in the east there will be no more business trip to london somewhat kidding portland ha issue with speed do to the fact that we still run their book through an interface with houston john lavorato will talk to tim beldon and beth to determine whether it worthwile to put server in portland since tim wa not in the meeting john will make sure we are covering all his need

body: dear john we are pleased to inform you that you are eligible for pricewaterhousecoopers tax preparation service the purpose of this note is to invite you to register and provide u with some initial information recognising the confidential nature of the tax return process we have established a secure website requiring unique user name and password detail of your user name can be found below when you access the website you will find all the supporting material and instruction that will take you through the entire process to log into our web site please visit wwwassigneecom and use the user name provided below to register once registered please review the content of your profile and update or correct any missing or inaccurate information you can also begin completing your tax workday calendar which can also be accessed from the site please note that our web site support the following web browser internet explorer and netscape communicator version x your user name for accessing the site is user name are case sensitive and should be entered exactly a shown above once registered you will have an opportunity to change your user name should you wish for added security your unique temporary password will be sent to you separately and you will be asked to change your password upon entering the site if you would prefer to complete a paper version of the tax data organizer please contact your enron tax team at and we will email the paper organizer to you a an attachment along with a few additional item that will need to be completed and submitted with your completed organizer if you have any question please feel free to respond via email to me directly judy jones pricewaterhousecoopers

subject: jeff mcmahon named cfo
body: today we announced the appointment of jeff mcmahon a enrons chief financial officer in my continued discussion with the financial community yesterday and today it became clear that this move wa required to restore investor confidence jeff ha unparalleled qualification and a deep and thorough understanding of enron he is already on the job and hard at work on the issue before u andy fastow will be on a leave of absence from the company jeff had been serving a chairman and ceo of enron industrial market he joined enron in and spent three year in the london office a chief financial officer for enrons european operation upon returning to the u jeff wa executive vice president of finance and treasurer for enron corp in he wa named president and chief operating officer of enron net work i know all of you are concerned about the continuing decline in our share price i am too and we are working very hard to turn it around appointing jeff a cfo is one important step in that process but most of the solution involves just continuing to do our job with excellence the fundamental of our business are strong and i think the market will begin to see that a we continue to perform please join me in giving jeff your full support and thank you for all of your continued hard work

still on for drink after work right by then you should have a comfort level with the quality of my work i think the analysis ive given you ha been quite accurate a to market turn and price behavior it would be helpful if i had some idea of how you tradeview the market are you mainly daytrading or do you hold position for several daysweeks that way i can structure my comment in order to best serve couple week well talk later john mark sagel on pm john arnold cc natural update john the price behavior of the past couple day ha been disappointing my shortterm market pattern suggested a more robust price rally and natural appears to be waning at present volume on this rally is poor particularly since yesterday wa a decent day to the upside the market appears to be using a lot of it energy but spinning it wheel if we are at these same price level in another two week that would be extremely bullish right here the riskreward to being long is not so great recommend a neutral stance shortterm on natural bigger picture is still very bullish however this market need another week of what i would call horizontal price action to set the stage for a big move to the upside let me know if this mark sagel

subject: grigs
body: grigsbys socal book wa transferred to phillip allen for liquidation grigsby will be responsible for trading the gas daily book lesson learned grigsby doubled down at the top of the market see price graph below light blue line the element of time while the fundamental analysis regarding storage look correct the timing of the trade appears to have been too early core and non core socal customer o core the west desk fundamental analysis considered only the core user who cantwont forward hedge because their price risk is inherently tied to index this being the case there is sentiment is that the trade will return however the time between today and then is too long too risky o non core analysis here did not truly recognize that the non core customer base canwill in fact forward hedge or that their hedging would have a material impact on the curve it is my understanding that these non core customer are selling gas and buying power in the back of the curve note both np power price and socal have dropped from midmarch and in the front of the gas curve they are buying a an aside a the political rhetoric heat up the market place appears to be getting jittery that while nothing will be done tomorrow something may in fact be done in the long run impacting price i spoke with grigsby regarding any other large counter party that may be experiencing similar pain and he said that basically enron is the only one so it appears a if counterparty credit risk are minimal frank

body: cpuc delay qf payment vote source believe that the delay in the puc vote on paying the qfs of their undercollected debt is likely a result from both a concern about bankruptcy issue raised by issuing what could be seen a a preference payment to the qfs the puc doe follow these issue out of necessity given the current environment and a lack of clarity regarding how to implement the payment the delay wa unsurprising and characteristic of how the puc operates it is also noted that there are many claim on socals and pges cash flow currently additionally agreeing to pay of debt to the qfs raise legal issue in that the utility would be paying debt to some creditor but not others this could increase the likelihood of an involuntary bankruptcy filing against socal by the nonqf creditor

subject: how are you
body: mark sorry i havent called or written in quite some time but im in my own little world here at home thing are going very well here charles will be almost month old and i cant believe how much he ha grown we finally have established a day and night routine for him and im happy to report that im starting to get more sleep which is nice im still running and playing alot of tennis which ha helped me keep my sanity i have really enjoyed my stay at home it nice to be able to watch your kid grow up and both arthur and charles i think have really benefitted from u both being home with them i feel very fortunate i would really like to have lunch with you in the next few week so that i can catch up on what ha been going on and begin discussing with you my thought about returning to work it something that i havent given too much thought to but need to a the end of the year approach here are some good date for me november th th th st nd let me know waht work for you sorry that i havent brought charles up to see everyone but with all that we have going on here it hard to find the time to make the trip into down town look forward to hearing from you carol

subject: sec informationearnings restatement
body: today we released additional information about our related party and offbalance sheet transaction we have made this information available both on our website and in a form k filing with the security and exchange commission sec the information provides further detail about the billion charge to shareholder equity announced in the third quarter and the transaction related to that charge a restatement of prior year financial statement to reflect this reduction in shareholder equity the consolidation of three entity and prior year proposed audit adjustment and reclassification the special committee appointed by the enron board of director to review transaction between enron and related party the ljm limited partnership including a discussion of transaction between enron and ljm entity and transaction between enron and other enron employee this information address a number of concern that have been raised by our shareholder and the sec a our board new special committee continues it review of various matter we will continue to cooperate fully with the sec in it investigation and we will continue to respond to investor request so that they can evaluate appreciate and appropriately value the strength of our core business restatement of earnings based on information that we have recently obtained enron and it auditor determined that certain offbalance sheet entity should have been included in enrons consolidated financial statement pursuant to generally accepted accounting principle a a result enron will restate it financial statement from to and for the first and second quarter of these restatement have no material effect on enrons current financial position here are some detail included in the filing net income for each period will be impacted by the retroactive consolidation of joint energy development investment jedi and chewco beginning in november the consolidation of an ljm subsidiary for and and prior year proposed audit adjustment enrons current assessment indicates that the restatement will include a reduction of approximately million in a reduction of approximately million in a reduction of approximately million in a reduction of approximately million in an increase of approximately million for the first quarter of an increase of approximately million for the second quarter of a reduction of million for the third quarter of the consolidation of jedi and chewco also will increase enrons debt by approximately million in million in million in and million in the restatement will have no material impact on enrons reported earnings for the ninemonth period ending september you can obtain more detailed information on the item described above by accessing the form k filing at httpwwwenroncomcorpsec we will continue to review our strategic operational and financial position and we will continue to keep you updated on any development

subject: jeff mcmahon named cfo
body: today we announced the appointment of jeff mcmahon a enrons chief financial officer in my continued discussion with the financial community yesterday and today it became clear that this move wa required to restore investor confidence jeff ha unparalleled qualification and a deep and thorough understanding of enron he is already on the job and hard at work on the issue before u andy fastow will be on a leave of absence from the company jeff had been serving a chairman and ceo of enron industrial market he joined enron in and spent three year in the london office a chief financial officer for enrons european operation upon returning to the u jeff wa executive vice president of finance and treasurer for enron corp in he wa named president and chief operating officer of enron net work i know all of you are concerned about the continuing decline in our share price i am too and we are working very hard to turn it around appointing jeff a cfo is one important step in that process but most of the solution involves just continuing to do our job with excellence the fundamental of our business are strong and i think the market will begin to see that a we continue to perform please join me in giving jeff your full support and thank you for all of your continued hard work

subject: isda comment
body: mr davis susan flynn passed on to me your comment to the isda draft please call me when you are ready to discus with respect to the guaranty amendment that we had requested it is just meant to clarify in the termination section that if the guaranty is terminated then the guarantor is still responsible for all of the counterpartys obligation with respect to any transaction that were entered into prior to the termination date even if such obligation are incurred after the termination date i do not feel that the termination language a currently written in both the wps and enron guaranty clearly reflects this concept a the language a currently written state that the guaranty is revocable only with respect to liability occurring on or after the termination date i look forward to hearing from you carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: message from ken lay
body: earlier today i stepped down a enrons chairman of the board and chief executive officer this decision wa reached in cooperation with enrons board and the creditor committee and is effective immediately to emerge from bankruptcy enron need a ceo who can focus percent of his or her effort on rebuilding the company unfortunately with multiple inquiry and investigation that require my immediate attention at this time i am unable to fully concentrate on what is most important to enrons stakeholder preserving value for our creditor and our dedicated employee the creditor committee ha begun a search for a restructuring specialist to serve a interim ceo to help the company emerge from bankruptcy this individual will join enrons remaining management team to direct the company ongoing operation i truly believe enron can and will survive i will remain a director of the board to help see that it doe during my time at enron i have witnessed tremendous change and opportunity i have seen people rigorously grow and maintain one of the world most efficient and safest gas pipeline network i have seen people dedicate themselves to a cause that became a passion the opening of energy market i have observed smart people come together a a team to build creative solution like enrononline and i have watched people tirelessly give of themselves to help their fellow employee and those in the community regardless of what ha happened i am proud of so much of what we were able to accomplish here thank you for your contribution to the company and for the inspiration you have been to me over the year ken lay

subject: program change
body: a you know this is an unprecedented time in enrons history we must adapt our employee program to fit the immediate need of our company during this time of transition it is especially difficult to announce the immediate suspension of the following program clickathome enron ha suspended the clickathome program the program will no longer accept new participant pc order or internet service order order submitted and confirmed prior to november will be honored enron will also discontinue subsidized internet service effective january employee who are currently subscriber to subsidized internet service will be switched to the regular commercial rate of their service provider and be responsible for the entire cost of the service matching gift and volunteer incentive program vip enrons matching gift program and vip grant have been suspended indefinitely a we consider the immediate need of all employee during this trying time it is appropriate that we discontinue the dollar for dollar match for charitable contribution a well a cash donation recognizing employee volunteer hour with nonprofit organization matching gift or vip submission received prior to november will be honored we regret that we have had to make these change we must continue to look for way to reduce operating expense through this transition period

subject: re option
body: andy the problem if we limit the size on option to being what size is offered on the swap hedge we will not be able to offer adequate size on the option optimally i think we want to offer a minimum size of across all strike if the swap is one a day up and someone buy half a day making the market one a day by half a day the size offered on a cent out of the money call might be a low a contract a much smaller size than most people want to trade if we restrict to strike with a lower delta we face the problem of not offering enough strike and not making a market in option that have open eol interest that have moved closer to the money maybe the answer is to assume the swap hedge to be a penny wide two way wrapped around the eol swap mid market thus if the front swap on eol is one a day by half a day the input into the option calculator is up in this case i think is necessary because once a strike ha open interest we must continue to support it thus i anticipate having to make market in deep itm option a the market move in term of straddle strike i think the edge received from buying straddle struck on the eol offer and viceversa is not big enough to compensate for what i think the industry will view a a scam and another way enron is trying to rip people off although striking on the midmarket is probably easier for the trader i actually think striking in five cent increment make more sense it allows people to trade out of the position on eol whereas if someone buy the straddle and the market move to they have to call ene to close the trade if the trade is struck at we will have a market on both the call and put at all time secondly i would anticipate nonvolatility driven option trader may elect to sell either just the put or call in this scenario depending on their view of market direction

subject: denver plachy
body: january dear john lavorato hunter shively andy lewis and chris gaskill i regret to inform you that i will be resigning from the new enronubs warburg venture and will await further direction in the effort to fulfill my current obligation it is definitely with a bit of sadness that i have arrived at the conclusion to leave the new enronubs warburg venture but i believe that it is in the best interest of my young career in addition after signing a ubs offer letter i have realized over the last two day that given my current assignment it would be very difficult for me to continue to be motivated and to produce in the manner that would please both management and myself therefore i believe it is in the best interest of both party that i leave the new enronubs warburg venture although this decision wa not an easy one for me to make i have decided to pursue other opportunity i am extremely grateful for the opportunity i have been given here in this organization and for the investment that both you a individual and the organization a a whole have made in my personal career development i believe i have worked hard at enron and i trust that i made significant value adding contribution it is because of my experience here and the tutelage that all of you have given me that i have my current knowledge and opportunity i am very grateful for all of my experience here at enronubs warburg and i would like to personally thank all of you guy upon your return from connecticut i will also make a concerted effort to maintain contact with all of you ubs warburg energy will certainly be a successful organization and i wish you all the best of luck with the exciting challenge of rebuilding this great business i await your direction upon receiving my intention to resign and i offer my service in order to make the process a smooth a possible sincerely denver plachy

subject: gtl next step
body: john and larry based on the latest information egm want to be able to marktomarket million on the gtl contract this quarter to do so we need gtl to sign and get final approval of a contract that doe not have any contingency or condition precedent to it effectiveness i will call kevin alexander to explain what egm expects to have in place by the end of this month and if necessary i will go to london to work through the specific language based on the latest email from kevin he think that the project must achieve financial close by june this is not necessary and is obviously impossible in general i will stick a closely a possible to the term of the marketing agreement already signed and remove any project related contingency if egm ha the exclusive right to market gtls methanol then we should be able to mark some income then the discussion will focus on how much to reserve if necessary i will bring up a fixed offtake price for up to metric ton per year but i do not think it will be necessary a prepay is definitely off the table john i believe that your preference is not to take any fixed price risk rather to collect a fee for marketing methanol this will be easier to get approved any contract with a fixed price will require signoff from bjorn after getting the proper contract to satisfy this month need for income we will have to work hard to make the underlying project in darwin feasible to avoid having to reverse the mtm income later this will at a minimum require forcing phillips to agree to a floating gas feedstock price and a settlement of the east timor dispute with australia for the gas note that this issue is a wild card and could kill the deal at any time here are the very rough number for what we can marktomarket assuming a marketing fee ten year contract starting in million ton per year various average delivered methanol price per ton k per year of admin expense to market methanol a credit reserve and no other reserve price mtm earnings million million million unless i hear otherwise i will proceed with getting gtl to sign and get approved by it board a mtm contract by the end of this month jim

subject: natural gas origination
body: our natural gas business continues to benefit from effective account management and resource allocation focused on identifying and responding to the need of our varied customer in order to keep our organization optimally structured and to facilitate additional growth we are making the following change producerwellhead group the current midmarket origination and wellhead pricing activity currently within the central and eastern gas region will be consolidated with the derivative group under fred lagrasta this will create a single business unit focused upon the need of the producing industry within the eastern u the producer focus in the western u and texas will remain unchanged reporting to mark whitt and brian redmond respectively strategic asset development laura luce will move from her role in the central region to lead an effort focused strictly on identifying and entering into longterm strategic arrangement within the central and eastern region this initiative will focus on a limited number of selected market that provide strategic opportunity for partnering in asset development asset management and optimization this effort will continue to work very closely with the regional lead central origination and midmarket frank vickers will continue his current role in the eastern region and will assume the leadership role for midmarket and origination activity in the central region there will be no change to the west and texas origination group headed respectively by barry tycholiz and brian redmond please join u in congratulating fred laura and frank in their new role louise john

subject: 4urgent owa please print this now
body: current note user reason for using outlook web access owa once your mailbox ha been migrated from note to outlook the outlook client will be configured on your computer after migration of your mailbox you will not be able to send or recieve mail via note and you will not be able to start using outlook until it is configured by the outlook migration team the morning after your mailbox is migrated during this period you can use outlook web access owa via your web browser internet explorer to read and send mail please note your calendar entry personal address book journal and todo entry imported from note will not be available until the outlook client is configured on your desktop remote access to your mailbox after your outlook client is configured you can use outlook web access owa for remote access to your mailbox please note at this time the owa client is only accessible while connecting to the enron network lan there are future plan to make owa available from your home or when traveling abroad how to access outlook web access owa launch internet explorer and in the address window type httpnahoumsowapexchangejohndoe substitute johndoe with your first and last name then click enter you will be prompted with a sign in box a shown below type in corpyour user id for the user name and your nt password to logon to owa and click ok you will now be able to view your mailbox please note there are some subtle difference in the functionality between the outlook and owa client you will not be able to do many of the thing in owa that you can do in outlook below is a brief list of some of the function not available via owa feature not available using owa task journal spell checker offline use printing template reminder timed delivery expiration outlook rule voting message flag and message recall sharing contact with others task delegation direct resource booking personal distribution list question or concern if you have question or concern using the owa client please contact the outlook question and answer mailbox at otherwise you may contact the resolution center at thank you outlook migration team

subject: entouch newsletter
body: business highlight enron industrial market eim ha recently formed a forest product origination team led by rob saltiel to pursue structured transaction typically these deal employ a combination of physical supplyofftake price risk management andor finance to bring value to enron and our customer priority commodity include pulp newsprint recycled paper linerboard and lumber response to the new team effort ha been positive a many of the forest product company have need for commodity and capital solution that are currently unavailable enron freight market during it first month in the overtheroad otr trucking business enron freight market ha completed over spot otr trade on friday march there wa a shortage in the houston outbound market and capacity wa selling for per mile by comparison average market price ha stayed in the per mile range in recent week enrononline on may enron corp announced that it completed it onemillionth transaction on enrononline the world largest webbased ecommerce platform for commodity a an online extension of it successful wholesale energy business enrononline began transacting natural gas and electricity on november since that time the company ha extended the platform to approximately wholesale commodity product ranging from energyrelated commodity to bandwidth metal forest product plastic petrochemical and weather and credit derivative approximately percent of all enron transaction are now conducted online and the cost of processing the transaction ha been reduced by percent enrononline statistic below are the latest figure for enrononline a of may total life to date transaction million life to date notional value of transaction billion in the news enron corp chief executive officer jeff skilling like to say that the nation leading energy merchant wa ready for the internet long before there wa anythingcom enrons business of buying and selling commodity by phone or fax wa a natural fit for the web the challenge now is to get the new broadband internet trading unit on solid footing by proving that bandwidth can be traded like a commodity businessweek ebizmay welcome new hire egm gregory sharp david cho eim subject: isda tax issue
body: rhett you may recall a few week ago i asked you about some language that one of our counterparties wanted a an amendment to the term indemnifiable tax another counterparty deutsche bank ha requested the following which i think is very similar to what we were looking at before notwithstanding the foregoing indemnifiabletax also mean any tax imposed by reason of a change in tax law by a government or taxing authority of a relevant jurisdiction of the payer unless the payee is incorporated organized managed and controlled or considered to have it seat in such jurisdiction or is acting for purpose of this agreement through a branch or office located in such jurisdiction in the isda user guide they explain that the effect of this language is to eliminate the payee risk of bearing new tax imposed by the payer jurisdiction even if the payee activity in such jurisdiction is the basis for such tax except if the circumstance in the definition occur it thus result in the payer having to gross up for such tax do you think that we can or should accept this carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: how are you
body: sara thanks for your note and sorry that i havent called recently i have joined some day time tennis league at our club and between that charles arthur etc life ha been fairly hectic i keep trying to pick a good day to come up to the office but so far have not found a day that work for both bill and i but hopefully ill see everyone soon by the way you and anyone else in the group are always welcome to come out here i know that it is far and that you all are busy but feel free to plan something if you want how are the legal assistant and the rest of the group how are you doing i must say that i am enjoying my time away from the office charles is doing great he is now pound ounce and allot inch he is growing like a weed and eats often which keep me busy round the clock although he ha started to sleep some more at night we are slowly but surely getting into a routine with him and i feel blessed to have bill here to help it hard to believe that month ha already gone by time fly when you are having fun anyway hang in there and keep me posted say hi to mike for me and if he ever want to play some tennis please call u carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: enron center south technology watch
body: welcome to enron center south a you have probably already noticed thing look a little different here we wanted to orientate you to your new environment and inform you about the future technology coming online in the coming week occupancy guidebook to enron center south you will find this handy guide on your desk it contains information concerning the enhanced printer environment the new easy access keyboard and telephony procedure nec monitor the nec monitor have an internal antiglare screen to help reduce eye strain and eliminate the need to install an additional screen cover additionally an integrated speaker ha been installed on one monitor for each desk turret user an alliance mx turret quick reference guide ha been placed on your desk this includes important information about the new feature such a caller id and voicemail indication increased information access there are many nec plasma screen installed on the th and th floor while many of these will be displaying information designed for the specific unit others will be displaying various television channel the audio to these television channel can be accessed via any of your telephony equipment here how ten audio channel have been set up for access from your either your avaya telephone stentophon or ipc turret the channel have been defined on page of your turret to access the audio from either your avaya or stentophon simply dial the extension shown in the table below channel avaya stentophon weather channel cnn headline news cnn financial news cnbc msnbc bloomberg financial news network cnn fox sport espn wireless telephony you may notice the cellular phone coverage is not consistent across the floor and some area have virtually no coverage at all we are implementing a multinetwork inbuilding system to provide consistent high quality service for the campus keeping you in touch while you are on the move wireless lan the infrastructure to support wireless lan technology is in place and is being tested we will be implementing multi level encryption and security to keep our intellectual property safe from eavesdropper or hacker amtel replacement a a move to provide a more flexible plug n play environment and to help with the reduced desk footprint we have replaced the amtel message box with microsoft exchange instant messaging the global messaging team is testing additional software product to provide some of the feature not available with exchange instant messaging these include onetouch response key external led display and printing update will be provided a they become available keeping an open forum we will keep you informed of the change and development a the migration to the building continues please feel free to respond with any comment query or suggestion to

subject: eletrobolt
body: to follow up our conversation i met with the brett wiggs ranabir dutt and others today and have made the following clear brett wiggs is to document and implement a process for completion of the project under the caa that legitimizes that the project can not be completed to the standard required by the required action of the construction agency agreement until the new year ranabir dutt is to ensure that it is made clear in any communication with the project lender that completion to the standard required by the caa is not going to be achieved this year ranabir dutt is to ensure that the financing from opic requires some completion risk or requires a standard of completion lower than what is required for the project lender under the caa with all other condition to funding by opic to be otherwise satisfied before completion is a possibility under the caa the objective is to ensure that completion and funding risk is hedged between the project lender and opic or if opic flake to ensure that we can legitimately state to the project lender that completion will not occur until the new year a couple of additional point i told them not to worry about getting to a start date under the offtake agreement to achieve upside from capacity payment this year a it risked the project lender being able to legitimatize completion this year without opic being fully committed there is nothing preventing the project lender from asserting that completion ha occurred or declaring a default for nonpayment this year however i told them that we need to do the right thing so that the lender will face risk of wrongfully attempting to seek repayment if they do so they all seem to get the message i will follow up with them tomorrow peter

body: tanya here is the issue with respect to the goldman guaranty the new guarantor is now the goldman sachs group inc previously it wa the goldman sachs group lp in the existing guaranty we permitted goldman to assign it right to a successor guarantor without our consent if the successor guarantor met the following qualification a if the successor guarantor is a corporation at least of the voting stock had to be held by the same entitiespersons that owned and controlled the previous guarantor b if the successor guarantor is a partnership it had to be controlled by the same entitiespersons that controlled the previous guarantor the successor guarantor credit rating could not be lower than the lesser of y aa or z the predecessor guarantor credit rating prior to the transfer the successor guarantor had to have a total net worth of at least the successor guarantor had to be the direct or indirect parent of j aron their lawyer is telling me that now that goldman is public it can not agree to item are you okay if the criterion is just item and carol

subject: trade idea
body: thinking about bull move the only trade i really like is being long physical and short nymex if you believe that nymex is doing a buzz lightyear infinity and beyond the next question is where doe that put the cash back in chicago cash went to and merc died out sub dollar also had a huge geographic basis rift the structural shift had z trading about over waha on the upside cash will suffer constraint causing demand spike on the downside cash shouldnt materially outpace nymex reviewing geographic arb and considering the east coast political environment high potential for congressional intervention a well a okish storage the east may be the best basis sell v a long west trade waha im uncertain about particularly if the cold doesnt hit texaschicago might be better given whats going on there except for the alliance issuesocal appears to be the best geographic longpge citygate could really rock given storage and increase supply competition given alliance pl the zchicago spread is trading around for the winter fh and approx a dime in today intramonth the z v ngipgecg spread ha the janmar around cent z over intramonth it is trading at pgecg over z im waiting on additional stats but i think i like this trade additionally playing the scenario we should be long every basis downstream of henry and short something else maybe nymex waha katy notice smaller font im still reviewing economic stats regarding the driver to these trade such a sable island lng chippewa canadian import and chicagocalifornia storage a well a evaluating which geography would be the best buy preliminary trade let me know which one strike your interest and ill focus my analysis long ngipgecg short z long cng north valley short z long ngpl lousiana pool short mop tetco stx long cgt short nymex not very exciting small basis long z short chippewa long physical short nymex still looking still thinking but guntomyhead frank

body: dear sandra i sincerely apologize if i offended you in any way wednesday evening that wa certainly never my intention i let my competitive emotion take over i wa attempting to compare myself with other broker not any specific shop if i singled certain broker out that wa not my intention i wa honestly trying to stress that i really work hard to earn the business i can truly say that i slept very little that night reflecting on thing that were discussed in our dinner after pondering the discussion about the firmness of physical gas i wa afraid that i did not communicate my point well and insulted your intelligence and your ability to judge the intelligence of your broker i certainly would never purposely do that i respect your reputation in the market and your knowledge of the market upon reflection of the conversation i did not communicate my point concerning physical and i can not say enough that it wa not my intention to insult you whether you work at enron or not i have reviewed the conversation with steve and jon ray is at lunch and i can honestly say i wa trying to point out enrons strength in the marketplace i chose the west a the example because of the volatility i certainly meant it on how the market ha changed not how enron manipulates the market or is putting trader out of job i am embarrassed that i lost my composure i felt you were trying to challenge our group to raise our level of game which you did i did not mean to dominate the conversation from natsources point of view steve and i agreed that we both could have handled the discussion much better i do not blame steve a my bos or jon a the desk head for not stopping the conversation i am an adult and a professional so i take full responsibility a broker our job is to communicate clearly we failed in this regard i obviously would like to make it up to you and your firm i hope my lack of composure doe not cost my entire firm any of enrons business i hope i can work through the issue i created for the gulf desk i will take it personally to take your point about our desk and make them happen i do not want you uncomfortable with anyone who speaks with you your respect for ray is obvious and i will try to support whatever you decide to the fullest sincerely aaron

subject: new curve generation methodology
body: i am changing the way the curve is generated starting in jan to better replicate seasonal fundamental there are convincing argument a to why the summerwinter spread should tighten over time however in the previous methodology they blew out for instance summerwinter in cal wa while cal wa i have added a seasonality dampening function that both contract the summerwinter spread and applies a premium to the electric load demand month of july and august over time the formula for the curve remains the same except for a premium lookup for the month a well a for the year these premium are a follows jan feb mar apr may jun jul aug sep oct nov dec these premium start in jan on wednesday jan settled the spread wa marked at the spread wa marked at in the old methodology jan jan jan in the new methodology jan jan jan the only change in the formula is from month x month x year lookup on year on year table to month x month x year lookup on year on year table lookup on month premium table the seasonality premium will change over time and i will let you know when i change them
