subject: re ny v texas law and definition
body: john my fault it should say succeeding scheduled payment date and scheduled payment date is defined in section of the isda form a far a choice of law we can go with ny although i disagree with your counsel in that in order for the new york choice of law to be enforced by a court the party have to demonstrate some minimum relationship with the jurisdiction chose carol st clair eb phone fax shuttee john am carol st clair cc shuttee john ny v texas law and definition carol two issue first dealing with the applicable law you can see from the copy message below from our legal counsel that we will not accept texas law second i looked through my isda booklet and can not find that term succeeding payment date defined anywhere can you specify where it is defined john answer from legal we will not accept texas law a the governing law over the isda all of el pasos isdas are governed by new york law the isda wa created under ny law by ny financial practitioner there is substantial case law for isdas using new york law the user guide reference ny case law you do not have to have a contact in new york new york is not the venue it is the governing law arbitration may be held in houston texas using new york law

subject: re market opinion about aga
body: interesting observationbut im not sure i agree i think consensus opinion is that anything under tcf is very dangerous entering the winter a month ago analyst were predicting we would end the injection season with around in the ground with the most recent aga those projection seem to be closer to with supply of gas very inelastic to price in the short and medium term you must look at the demand side of the equation the market is trying to price out the right amount of demand mostly through lost industrial load and fuel switching such that supply will be stored rather than burned each aga number is another data point a to whether nat gas is high enough to price out enough demand to reach a comfortable level in storage entering the winter a low aga number indicates we havent priced out enough demand and the market must go up certainly the throw a curve in the bull argument but the number may be a function of very mild weather a four day holiday weekend and reporting noise rather than indicative of a structural shift in the supplydemand equilibrium well know a lot more a the next two week number come out if we get two low injection watch out enron north america corp frank hayden enron pm john cc market opinion about aga john i think the aga are not a important to bull a to bear in the beginning of the season aga were very important in framing the bull case the current expectation is that we will go into the winter under stored i dont believe any additional aga news can significantly change that expectation however i believe bear a evidenced today will feed more heavily off of bearish aga news than bull will off bullish aga news at this juncture i believe that the most potent bullish news ha to come from the physical market and weather i hope you dont mind me expressing my view point on this issue thanks frank

subject: california power 29
body: the following information is from sensitive source please treat with discretion contact robert johnston x or kristin walsh x for question or additional info bankruptcy early this week there wa a closed door meeting held by the western power trading forum in arizona the meeting took place outside california to avoid press coverage and allow ipps to maintain a low profile association representative believe that regardless of what happens with the puc v utility ruling expected on monday some ipps will take the utility into involuntary bankruptcy our source expects that absent a significant last minute breakthrough the filing will happen within the next two week and probably next week a stated in yesterday report the ipps are very low on cash and are not able to cover the debt of the pge and socal only three creditor are needed with uncollected debt of more than to file involuntary bankruptcy bail out davis ha been meeting with the chief executive of both utility in a last ditch effort to make a deal prior to monday court ruling the most likely scenario is for state ownership of the utility transmission asset however coming to an agreed upon price will be very challenging in addition pge and edison appear to have competing agenda in pursuing a bail out plan davis is expect to continue meeting through out the weekend in hope of reaching an agreement before monday

subject: otc ng price book trade
body: the eol reporting database treat any distinct deal number a a separate unique deal an example would be a deal done with kukui inc on november th it is booked a deal number q q q and q these are four separate and unique deal number and therefore count a a total of four deal we understand that the trade desk may consider the deal in this example a just one large deal with different part unfortunately the eol reporting database ha no way of telling whether or not these type of deal are distinct different deal or part of one larger deal since this currently can not be known the eol reporting database us the most conservative approach and count them all a individual deal this result in a higher otc deal count and thus a lower eol percentage of all deal if you have any further question please dont hesitate to ask pete berzins x

body: after several very difficult week enron announced on friday that the company ha reached an agreement to merge with dynegy i know that everyone ha many question right now regarding the future of the associate analyst program we are working a quickly a possible with the business unit and executive management to determine the future course of the program a the merger point on the enron homepage indicate httphomeenroncom dynegy ha a similar program called pace and the two company will consider a combination of the two program today all of the business unit within enron will be holding floor meeting to discus the pending merger and it implication for enron i encourage each of you to participate in one of these meeting the announcement of the deal with dynegy mark a significant event in removing some of the uncertainty weve all dealt with over the past several week a decision are made regarding the future of the company and specific business unit we will be able to determine and communicate the future of the program new opportunity will be created from the change that are occurring the very best talent from both organization will rise to the top and our associate and analyst will be a key part of our future success i appreciate your continued effort and patience during this difficult time billy lemmon vice president associate analyst program

subject: re how are you today
body: adam hope your interview go well thing are going crazy in the gas market so unfotunately im stuck at my desk and cant go up for interview a far a the interview go my advise would be the same a any interview be confident answer the question asked dont be afraid to say you dont know but dont make excuse express interest in why you find enron appealing compared to the other company interviewing the trading training program is still in the work few people outside the trading area are even aware of it existence at this point so i wouldnt ask any question about it in the interview if you receive an offer it would probably be for a normal analyst position with the opportunity to enter the training program when you arrive not sure about that last statement though the training program is geared towards our two most mature and pure trading business area gas and power there are still a large number of other trading spot in our developing commodity side that would not fall under the program thats a function of the program being developed by the head of these two business not ready to take it corporatewide yet write me about how your interview went good luck john adam bayer on pm cc how are you today hi john how are you today you must be pleased with enrons most recent number could you tell me a little more about the trading training program you mentioned you wanted to expand it to two year but what doe the extra year entail i have been selected for an interview next monday and i look forward to seeing you again do you have any tip on approaching the interview process i have poured over the company website and if you have any tip i would love to hear them thanks for your time and i hope to see you monday cordially adam bayer

subject: re cplnc power holding agreement
body: kendal this is my last day at enron so i apologize for not getting back to you earlier this week to try to wrap up the cpl eei master there were many loose end i had to tie up and ive run out of time so carol st clair another lawyer in our group will be pursuing the eei master with you with genia fitzgerald help a for nc power holding there is no eei master for the daily call option transaction and there wont be one we decided to pursue this transaction a a oneoff deal on our longform confirm bc the credit term we would have required of cpl for an eei master were troubling to cpl and would have delayed the transaction beyond the point that the party found tolerable now of course cpl ha worked through some of those issue but at the time we just decided to use another approach hope this answer your question it wa a pleasure working with you and i hope our path will cross again regard janice eb assistant general counsel enron north america corp fax bowman kendal am cc cplnc power holding agreement janice i apologize for not giving you a call back to discus the cplenron eei agreement we still need to set up a time to discus i am available this afternoon and all day on friday let me know if either of those time work for you now the reason for this email i cant get a hold of the people internally that know did we execute an eei for nc power holding and cpl i have a copy of a confirmation letter but i can not find anything on the eei did we determine to just not execute an eei thanks for your help kendal bowman associate general counsel progress energy service company

subject: new draft
body: jack enclosed is a new draft of the schedule marked against the previous draft i believe that this draft responds to most of the issue raised in your email just a few additional thought since we will be redoing all of the existing confirms to refer to this master i did not change the language that state that conflict between the confirms and the agreement are resolved in favor of the confirm i think that the language a written work on the setoff language when we are the nondefaulting party we can only pull in other agreement between our affiliate and inland so i dont see how this language would impact any agreement between ena and guaranty bank unless inland is the nondefaulting party with respect to disruption fallback our view is that if the confirm specifies a fallback reference price that after postponement you would use that price if available i think that the language work a drafted on cash collateral the qualified institution concept only applies when the nonposting party is a defaulting party or ha a credit rating below the threshold otherwise the nonposting party can hold the collateral and do whatever it want to with it your are correct that in practice this cash get commingled with corporate fund and swept into the party bank account but there is no requirement taht it work that way we look forward to having a call with your group next week please email me with some day and time so that i can alert our people thanks carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: re margin call financial
body: peter we have thought about this from time to time our primary concern ha not been the strict adherence to the contractual notice requirement because of the lack of substantive concern you mention but the fear of possible waiver of right that might take place if the request are not consistent or handled carefully these are all issue that apply to trading margin call generally most recently carol st clair who mark h ha asked to be the point lawyer for credit and credit issue ha been working on this problem mark peter keohane am mark cc william s russell margin call financial mark i recently wa dealing with russell in credit on a margin call letter for imc canada and it seemed to me that the letter in substance met credit requirement but did not comply with the isda in term of formality ie use of defined term currency specification notice and delivery timing notice address etc it seemed to me that the form they are using may have been drafted some time ago and need to be updated so that it is not a drafting exercise on a case by case basis practically to the extent that the counterparty will not object to delivery there really is no substantive concern however a credit is becoming a significant issue in commodity market if the counterparty want to object particularly in circumstance where their credit is getting tight i can see the lack of contractual compliance perhaps being problematic can somebody in your group develop a template perhaps a few will be required that could be used under the enron form the industrial form the isda form and for canada please call russell bill or me to discus peter

subject: california 620
body: summary yesterday hearing confirmed imminent death of socal mou plan b also drew little support state trust for generator unlikely qfsocal negotiation are treading water a socal run out the clock try to postpone involuntary filing bk court unlikely to view socal payment to qfs a preferential because of state order report few sign of legislative support for socal mou source report that bryson is in regular contact with many legislator but especially with hertzberg and keeley on the assembly side from which the plan b is being directed and bowen senate energy chairperson on the assembly side source believe that brysons comment may about the legislature warming up to the mou may be a smokescreen democratic senator alarcon said in the mou hearing yesterday that the mou is dead and is not going to pas reportedly no one attempted to contradict him member of the chamber of commerce large energy user turn the california manufacturer and technology association cmta and others also spoke out against the mou source found it remarkable that turn and the cmta who have been rival in plan b negotiation agreed with each other in strongly attacking the mou plan b are still foundering the plan b were not discussed at the hearing though some of the same issue came up for instance it wa discussed whether it wa possible to transfer all of edison obligation to a trust that pay out after the conclusion of litigation in the opinion of the governor counsel and other lawyer present this is shaky especially without the consent of creditor in their opinion there would have to be an agreement that would pay off everything the governor counsel stated there were constitutional problem with setting up a trust for what the generator are owed then letting them litigate over the trust also he stated that it wa not feasible for the state to be offering generator cash on the one hand while the ferc negotiated with them to refund the state for power purchase a ordered in the ferc decision monday the governor counsel stated that the only reasonable thing for the state to do wa to give the generator their cash then sue them for it qfsocal negotiation are treading water qf source suggest that the debate between socal and the puc a to whether the qfs should be paid or of what they are owed is not a real question but rather a stalling measure allowing socal to hold on to cash in advance of a filing or a global solution socal is just treading water said a source socal payment to qfs unlikely to be viewed a preference payment source also comment that socal payment to the qfs likely would not be seen a a preference payment in bankruptcy court because they were ordered by a state agency the puc however comment made in the socal conference call yesterday seem to indicate that solomon smith and perhaps other creditor may see the payment this way and may be willing to sign a bankruptcy petition

subject: re ice
body: hi noted that ice is competition i am not interested in u supporting that product at all i am still pushing campbell and others to use an alternate solution that give u the advantage of seeing flow first hand in a discrete way an ice solution more foil my attempt to build liquidity for the crude desk than gas currently ice ha a much better market share on crude and the addition of program fund would further frustrate our effort to ever build a flow business on the flip side ice will not solve campbell problem on gas prob not on crude either because there is no certainty they will get a tight market the very reason they are still talking to u so i guess i am not worried i am just pissed that these solution keep popping up that keep campbell and others from making decision now i still like the deutsche solution and am talking to them again next week should have some comment from campbell by then too i am still looking for a system that can also accommodate credit constraint a well you know our line are pretty full with all the bank who would be able to give u more flowdeutsche system could help this too will keep you informed c on a side note have been trying still to educate eol bob shultz on these consideration they are still debating whether we should have a clearing arrangement with someone that wont get around the cftc issue

subject: td waterhouse ipo center is accepting conditional offer
body: td waterhouse is now accepting conditional offer to purchase share of fisher scientific which is expected to price on to read the preliminary prospectus filed with the sec and place a conditional offer follow these step login to your account click on trading ipo center ipo offering in the list of current offering select the offering you want and then click on the continue button important information reaffirming your conditional offer once the registration statement is declared effective by the sec we will contact you via email to notify you of the effectiveness of the registration statement and the price a determined by the managing underwriter this normally occurs on the day prior to the first day of trading if you still wish to participate you will be required to respond to u by am et of the following business day to reaffirm your previously submitted conditional offer please note that the email notification will likely be sent after the market close please ensure that you have provided an email address that you are able to access after that time you may change your email address at anytime via the update email function within the ipo center if it is not possible to check your email after market hour you may reaffirm your conditional offer following effectiveness by going to the ipo order status within the ipo center choosing the conditional offer you want to reaffirm and clicking reaffirm conditional offer if you fail to reaffirm your conditional offer within the specified period your conditional offer will automatically be cancelled conditional offer are accepted once reaffirmed at the offering price determined by the managing underwriter after the registration statement becomes effective please note that reaffirming a conditional offer doe not guarantee an allocation of share thank you td waterhouse investor service inc member nyse sipc

subject: your may 31 pay advice
body: this message is to inform you that information contained on your printed pay advice for the pay period ending may may be misleading regardless of whether you have single or multiple direct deposit your net pay is correct but your pay advice will indicate that all of your pay ha been deposited collectively to other bank it doe not list specific bank account however if you view your pay advice in ehronline you will be able to confirm your scheduled direct deposit and verify the account to which the deposit were made you may access ehronline and view your pay advice by taking the following step click the following link to open ehronline httpsehronlineenroncom read the disclaimer click accept type your sap logon id eg your p id in the user id field enter your sap password in the password field click the logon button select paycheck inquiry from the dropdown list click the radio button next to result in period to select the default for the may pay advice click the continue button click the link for the pay period to display your pay advice scroll to the bottom of the screen to view your direct deposit detail if you have additional question about your pay advice or accessing ehronline please contact the isc customer care group at or thank you

subject: esa government negotiation
body: we reached a conceptual agreement with the government representative on sunday night the main point are rationing loss defined methodology giving distribution company recovery over the next month of rationing loss realised from june until the end of rationing in recovery includes financial compensation immediate funding of through bndes with brazilian government fund loan liquidated over the year period a tariff increase are realised funding scheduled by december th elektro ebitda impact of approximately rmillion or u million aprilmay mae settlement market will settle under current rule due to prerationing condition confirming the procedure used on elektros book impact of approximately r million or u million parcel a for the future all noncontrolable cost to which ldcs are subjected to including power purchase sector charge are passed through to final tariff either using a tracking account mechanism or by aligning adjustment date with the ldc tariff revision date tracking account will be subject to financial compensation from the date cost are incurred until the effective pas through and collection eliminating a major risk for the distribution sector elektro ebitda impact forward of r million or u million a had been considered in the plan this methodology represents major risk mitigation going forward a the initial power supply contract are renewed starting in parcel a from the past min parente ha agreed to the concept recovering non controllable that were not passed through to tariff since late using the same methodology agreed to for future recovery and ha a dedicated team from the federal attorney general office targeting a final solution in ten day elektro impact is r million or u million in the proposed mechanism for recovery is after the month for the rationing loss we are currently finalising a memo of understanding and the government team is winding up the settlement with the generator in order to finalize the term of the overall agreement min parente ha committed to resolving the open issue affecting investor in the power sector these agreement represent a major step forward significantly improving the value of our business by solving the pending issue for the rationing loss thus eliminating the annex controversy the mae should function normally allowing u to operate eletrobolt and settle against the pool total amount for the sector represent about r billion or u billion at the current rate our team ha led the sector negotiation for month since the rationing and have been instrumental in convincing the government of the need for implementing these change

subject: st croix refinery
body: jennifer asked me to explain about the effect of the refinery fire the st croix refinery ha their reformer offline the reformer is used to convert straightrun naphtha into a high octane blending component called reformate a well a some butane and lighter gas the effect would not really be a reduction in gasoline but a reduction in a high quality blending component which would make it harder to make rfg a of this writing the fire is out if you have any further question feel free to contact me jim

subject: re how are you today
body: adam hope your interview go well thing are going crazy in the gas market so unfotunately im stuck at my desk and cant go up for interview a far a the interview go my advise would be the same a any interview be confident answer the question asked dont be afraid to say you dont know but dont make excuse express interest in why you find enron appealing compared to the other company interviewing the trading training program is still in the work few people outside the trading area are even aware of it existence at this point so i wouldnt ask any question about it in the interview if you receive an offer it would probably be for a normal analyst position with the opportunity to enter the training program when you arrive not sure about that last statement though the training program is geared towards our two most mature and pure trading business area gas and power there are still a large number of other trading spot in our developing commodity side that would not fall under the program thats a function of the program being developed by the head of these two business not ready to take it corporatewide yet write me about how your interview went good luck john adam bayer on pm cc how are you today hi john how are you today you must be pleased with enrons most recent number could you tell me a little more about the trading training program you mentioned you wanted to expand it to two year but what doe the extra year entail i have been selected for an interview next monday and i look forward to seeing you again do you have any tip on approaching the interview process i have poured over the company website and if you have any tip i would love to hear them thanks for your time and i hope to see you monday cordially adam bayer

subject: re maecoex aneel resolution
body: joe we have had several conference call since last saturday perhaps you should talk to orlando and join u from now on this subject is in state of flux a you know those measure triggered a hostile reaction from dc and from g aneel jose mario and jose alves called me on saturday asking for help we discussed this subject internally over the weekend on monday joao defended aneel in the coex meeting however we were the only one other player were very angry they perceived the action a pure intervention despite necessary and timely for most aneel wa informed about the coex reaction and thanked u for our position we examined the resolution in great detail unfortunately it seems that aneel went far beyond it institutional responsibility the substance is ok the format is legally weak our strategy we will try to sell to abradee cbiie coex and abraceel is to remove the spotlight from the legal argument and propose to our industry peer to focus on the design of a new market agreement to create a sense of buyin we know that the change will be only cosmetic the basic principle of the resolution should be maintained a per enrons suggestion i spoke to aneel again jose mario and jose alves showing them how difficult the situation is in our view thard he only way to validate the measure is to write a new agreement fred and debora are working on that i wa open in saying that the resolution are weak from a legal standpoint they agreed with u publicly they say otherwise they said they are willing to negotiate we also expressed our view to aneel that part of the reaction is parochial some coex member will lose their job aneel agrees that is why they are inviting all ceo and chairman of the board to a meeting tomorrow where aneel will explain what is happening and ask for support from top management why ha aneel approached u perhaps two reason they know we defend market we wrote informativo regulatrio attached which basically purport the replacement of coex by a professional board i discussed those issue with rick shapiro before the ir wa issued to understand enrons view on power pool governance your commentsinvolvement would be very important it is a pretty delicate and messy situation my personal view this wa a necessary evil mae would not function otherwise our merchant plant would be in jeopardy i would dare to say that this is a window of opportunity to get mae working and therefore our long term strategy however the way aneel did wa disastrous they should have acted long before imposing gradual penalty now they suddenly fired ceo of the largest utility in brazil we should support aneel however it ha to be in a very diplomatic way orlando will take care of abradee joao coex srgio cbiee we have to walk over a fine line if we push to hard they will reject enron together with aneels resolution we should be the champion in drafting a new market agreement lm joe kishkill pm luiz cc joao carlos orlando sergio fred jose brett r maecoex aneel resolution when are we talking luiz maurer am joao carlos cc orlando joe sergio fred jose brett r maecoex aneel resolution perfect lm joao carlos albuquerque am orlando joe sergio luiz fred jose cc brett r maecoex aneel resolution at the coex meeting yesterday it wa clear from the lawyer presentation that there are ground to legally challenge aneels resolution some romantic guy were kind of going in that direction my position wa to take the subject to a market assembly for the shareholder to deliberate also everybody know and some acknowledged that mae governance wa not working our line of action at the assembly would be to support the general direction of the measure and at the same time preserve mae autonomy opening a negotiable line with aneel the main point of discussion will be if we should discus without going to court or after challenging aneel in court the assembly wa called for next thursday april th fred is going to talk to luiz maurer for u to have a deep exam of the resolution and see what point we can propose to aneel to improve also in that negotiable line we should discusspropose some name to the new coex we need to discus this subject tomorrow joo carlos

subject: csu fresno 115kv substation status
body: team listed below is a brief description on the status for the project eip associate is currently working on the ceqa initial draft study the draft will be complete on february th at this point it will be in our hand for review and comment i have scheduled for our review period to take no longer than one week so please be prepared the study will be coming to you on february th i want to get this study out to public review asap ee will be sending out an request for proposal rfp to three contractor this week to obtain cost to compare to the pge number received in their detailed study the rfp will contain various sketch and document detailing the following scope of work the overbuilding of the existing kv line to accommodate a kv circuit from the pge herndon bullard sub to the new csuf sub the installation of an underground kv circuit from the pge herndon bullard sub to the new csuf sub the yard work at the pge herndon bullard sub developing a strategy for the upcoming meeting with pge to go over the detailed study i am shooting for this meeting to take place during the last week of february i will be working with all of you in the mean time to make sure all base are covered and that a correct thorough agenda is developed i hope this give everyone an idea of where we stand feel free to call or respond back with any question or comment rob cone project manager enron energy service alcosta blvd suite san ramon ca ph fax pager

subject: another version of negative ctc risk
body: i have a concern about enrons forwardlooking exposure associated with legacy deal deal that existed during the june through the may price shock if edison get it way all customer will pay for edison underrecovery from june through january plus cdwr spot market purchase during this would take the form of a surcharge on future bill my concern is that enron will be on the hook for these future charge associated with past undercollections even beyond the term of our legacy deal for example if a deal end in march we could be on the hook for surcharge that a legacy customer would receive on it bill after that date provided the surcharge pertained to cost incurred by the utility during the time that the legacy customer wa ours i have not received clear guidance from legal on this matter for example i asked both mike smith and steve hall to review the legacy safeway contract which is on pges paper they both indicated that there is a better chance than not that we are on the hook for these charge although good argument could be made that we should not be responsible for them angela schwarz indicated to me that outside counsel im not sure who think that we are not on the hook for these charge it is critical that we get clear guidance from legal on these risk we are in front of customer now deciding whether or not to go forward with extension or terminate contract after the initial term customer are asking u to make change to our change in law and utility nonperformance provision if we believe that we are wearing the surcharge risk beyond the term of the existing contract and the customer is willing to take those from u in exchange for change to the master agreement we would probably be willing to do it if we arent currently wearing surcharge risk beyond the term of the existing contract then our negotiating position would be different a you all know the magnitude of this risk is potentially large a our negative ctc receivable is in the hundred of million of dollar if the cpuc were to adopt edison proposal for the entire state ee customer would be responsible for surcharge of the same magnitude at this point i dont know whether ee or it customer are on the hook for this risk beyond the term of existing contract vicki could you forward this message to mike smith i couldnt tell which mike smith to send it to

subject: broadband solution architect
body: jennifer mike rabon had just forwarded to me this helpful synopsis of the opportunity with kinkos a he see it i would like to forward this on to james thompson to assist him in targeting the right person for u to work with and cc mike rabon is this a good idea to forward on the email or is it overkill given the email i sent yesterday second could i mention gary king mike rabons kinkos contact in the email thanks for your suggestion sj mr thompson here are several touchpoints identified by mike rabon the enron broadband service originator which may facilitate your finding the appropriate broadband solution architect at kinkos you may recall having met mike rabon in the october th meeting kinkos ha an ip network today with access to all branch kinkos had expressed the need to add more hub to that network and make some change to it in the spring time frame enrons goal would be to make a need assessment for the desired structure that kinkos would like to see a it pertains to near term network planning ip transport capacity requirement for mbps and burst potential ip transit capacity requirement and current contract usage for internet transit kinkoscom in particular ha a high potential for ip transit capacity storage a the hub and branch number grow there may be a need for managed storage enrons solution will reduce or eliminate the need to buy storage device mike rabon would like to speak with someone at kinkos about your storage strategy and growth collocation there is a substantial opportunity for enron to provide the actual space to be used for the hub a well a the ip transport from the hub interactive video enrons ipnet connect product will allow high quality h video conferencing at bandwidth well above k utilizing the enron ipnet connect network installed to branch can allow video cost to be significantly reduced and allow much higher video quality enrons utilization of ip precedence will allow business traffic internet traffic and video traffic to traverse the same network mike rabon would like to speak to the video conferencing product manager risk management enrons expertise in risk management need to be communicated to the proper person

subject: isda comment
body: sandy susan bailey passed on to me your comment to the isda draft and i can respond to some but not all of such comment at this point with respect to your canadian security rep i am checking with our counsel in canada about whether we can use your language instaed of ours with respect to the option rep and the esp rep in part section b i believe that both party need to make such rep the rep in part bgii is to cover the trade option exemption and it is different from the esp rep below it with respect to the language in part section a this is different from the setoff language what this is saying is that if a party ha fulfilled all of it payment obligation and an event of default occurs with respect to it the defaulting party the other party can not withhold any payment that it owes to the defaulting party this is different from the exercise of setoff right i would like to discus with you or your legal representative the removal of the arbitration language a it is enrons policy to have arbitration apply we would prefer to keep the termination currency specified in u dollar our tax group belief that we need the language in part ai ii why do you want to delete it i look forward to hearing from you carol st clair eb phone fax email

body: hey man no problemi know youre a busy manits getting ahrder to say how to play this thing sprds are massive contangominimal inverse in the winter indeed there shudnt be any problem to supply gas this winter but suply growth hasnt been stellar and prob wont rise from here nowim not a raging bull but the past couple of aga and the cash trength and the mkt structureno seller in the forward lead me to beleive there cud be more upside mkt is prob a range mkt for a time but overall i think this is a weather bet if we have a winter it will suport the whole curve if it warm i will be awfulstay in that rnage for spot price i think the prompt is out of the woodsif so long a we have normal weather nov cash will be ok wont trade lower than oct cash a long a we have big incentive to roll storage marapr i bailed basically washed in the long term it prob ok but they arent gon na let me make any serious money on it in the next few week prob longer so why have it on esp when this winter is such a big discount to nexti guess there some risk hj move higher if they y on y sprds come in much not sure so i bailed i dont disagree with you on the calender sprds but i just dont think the entry pt is attractive about the only thing im running is nov long agaisnt dec and jan short pretty netrual no big bet on for nowfirst time in a awhile nothing is that obvious to me if mktstays sort of balanced until end dec i mite take a shot on the long side late dec early jan i struggle paying sucha big premium for the forward curve

body: to better leverage intellectual capital across enron net work we have several organizational announcement to share with you sally beck tom gros and beth perlman will work together to direct our effort to commercialize our mid and back office service they will report to the enw office of the chair sally will continue to lead the daytoday operation of our mid back office in addition to leading the development and marketing of commodity logic tom will have primary responsibility for the marketing of our mid back office service beth will continue to lead it development for the america including commodity logic and all other system necessary to deliver mid back office service joining tom marketing team are sheri thomas frank davis andrea crump jeff harbert and fred philipson the enrononline product control function currently reporting to sheri thomas will fold into enrononline operation savita puthigai will lead the combined group which will have responsibility for all nonit daytoday operation sheri will move to the mid back office commercialization effort reporting to tom gros jennifer denny will assume sheris responsibility a the lead for product control amita gosalia director of enrononline europe support ha accepted a new position with eb in london with her departure lara field will assume responsibility for the enrononline support team in europe and report to savita paul goddard will continue to lead our marketing effort in europe and report directly to andy zipper who will continue to lead all of enrononlines activity angela connelly will continue to manage enrononlines content in europe and report to kal shah additionally john pavetto john cummings john allario mike haney and jake staffel will join andys team to focus on origination opportunity around the enrononline application rex shelby and david berberian will focus on special initiative and new business opportunity brandon wax will manage enws investment portfolio mark s palmer will lead the transaction development and structuring team in their new role rex brandon and mark will report to the enw office of the chair please join u in congratulating everyone on their new responsibility and thank you for your continued support a we position enw for the future

subject: westlb transaction
body: john the attached is a summary by greg of the financining for the turbine purchased from new brunswick power in summary ecc pay the bank west lb directly in three installment under an offbalance sheet lease financing arrangement the first installment of u mm wa made dec the next installment is due feb of u mm and the third installment is due roughly march of u mm the drag on the financing is that west lb through whom ena structure it offbalance sheet turbine financing is not a canadian resident for tax purpose and therefore is not tax efficient to ecc in that there is a withholding tax payment on the interest not principal component of each leasefinancing payment an offbalance sheet financing with a canadian resident financial institution would eliminate this tax inefficiency and this is what i wa referring to when i indicated some work may still be required to restructure the turbine financing the withholding tax if we keep this structure will total roughly c over all of the leasefinancing payment chris calger ha the exact figure any decision to change the structure should have regard to these cost and the transaction cost and fee associated with finding a new canadian resident offbalance sheet lender in addition if we decide to keep the turbine or sell or transfer the turbine to ena or a third party depending on commercially what it is we decide to do with them additional work may be required to take title to the turbine or to assignrestructure the west lb financing and the new brunswick power purchase agreement i am confident that the bulk of commercial legal work for any of these transaction can be handled internally but that the tax legal work may require the input of outside counsel we are also obligated to pay gst but this is ultimately reimbursed through the lease financing althoguh there is a time value of money component that is not recovered from the time gst is paid and when the gst rebate is made

subject: recent alum
body: i am very very sad to report that dave engelbrecht evmba passed away on june dave had a heart attack two week ago and wa in a coma until he passed away dave wa a wonderful fun giving and active person who commitment to charitable work wa enormous dave wa a vice president at schwab and the evmba social chair for two year while he wa in the program he will be sorely missed for those of you who knew him i have attached below an announcement that come from schwab regard diane it is with great sadness that we mourn the passing of dave engelbrecht our colleague and friend a memorial service will be held next tuesday june at pm at the first unitarian universalist church at franklin street in san francisco a reception will follow the service from to pm at the st francis yacht club on the marina san francisco direction to follow daves family ha requested that in lieu of flower contribution be made to the schwab fund for charitable giving dave engelbrecht memorial fund the memorial fund will establish an endowment to support scholarship at the haas school of business at the university of california at berkeley where dave earned his mba last june a you may know dave wa instrumental in the creation of the schwab fund for charitable giving and served a an officer to the fund in addition to his other responsibility at schwab contribution can be sent to schwab fund for charitable giving dave engelbrecht memorial fund montgomery street san francisco ca attn ann insley for question please call

subject: organizational announcement
body: the following announcement wa sent out from the enw office of the chair on sunday october a a followup to the enron net work all employee meeting on october we are pleased to announce a number of organizational change beth perlman currently cio for ea system will work closely with mark pickering on a number of key project for enron net work additionally beth plan to explore various commercial opportunity within enron replacing beth in her current role will be steve hotte currently cio for egs anthony dayao will continue a cio for ee system in addition to his current responsibility anthony will assume responsibility for creating a combined wholesaleretail power trading and risk management system jeff johnson will move into the new role of cio for egmeim system john paskin will transfer to the houston office from london to take up the new role of cio for corporate system his group will include the isc enterprise portal intranet solution crm strategy treasury system development support and will matrix into hr it system continuing in their current position are inja chun cio for eb system paul freeman cio for enron europe jay webb cio for ecommerce which now includes commodity logic system and jenny rub cio for infrastructure all of the above position report into to mark pickering in the office of the chairman for enron net work transition into their new position will begin within the next two week and should be complete by the end of the year we are currently interviewing individual to serve a cio for egs a well a an individual to serve a head of our enterprise framework group we will keep you posted on the progress of these search please join u in congratulating all of these individual on their new responsibility

subject: 01194 amendment to nymex division position limit and reporting
body: notice to member no june corrects and supplement previous notice to member no all amended rule can be found on the new york mercantile exchange inc website httpwwwnymexcomreferncenoticesntm_rhtm all nymex division member all nymex division clearing member all nymex division member firm neal wolkoff executive vice president amendment to nymex division position limit and reporting rule amendment to large trader reporting requirement for light sweet crude oil and the addition of brent crude oil the board of director of the new york mercantile exchange inc ha approved various amendment to nymex division chapter rule which in general move away from hard position limit in any one month and all month combined to position accountability standard these amendment shall be effective a of the open of trading on friday june the amendment to any one month all month combined and option quadrant limit a cited in rule position accountability will provide for the ability for any participant to exceed the prescribed level a a note the level advocated for any one month and all month combined are the level currently in place for all month combined under the existing rule structure the currently defined any one month limit which are lower than the all month limit are being deleted additionally the gross side of market rule are deleted any market participant exceeding the defined position accountability level will be subject to being contacted by the exchange when the exchange deems it necessary and will be required to supply relevant information a to it position and the status of it account if the participant refuse to do so or if the exchange belief the position by it size is a threat to the orderly operation of the market a market participant can be direct ed either to not increase or to decrease it position the existing current delivery month on expiration limit a defined in existing rule will be unchanged and subject to hedgeswap exemption a they are today the only caveat to this is that certain cashsettled enymexsm contract will operate with some level of position accountability in the current delivery month further the large trader reporting level cited in rule for light sweet crude oil future ha been amended from to contract to coincide with existing cftc standard the soon to be traded brent crude oil future reporting level ha been added at the same level of contract lastly the any one monthall month position accountability level for the brent crude oil contract of ha been added all amended rule can be found on the new york mercantile exchange inc website httpwwwnymexcomreferncenoticesntm_rhtm __________________________________________________ please click on the link below to indicate you have received this email refdoc note if you click on the above line and nothing happens please copy the text between the quote open your internet browser paste it into the web site address and press return

subject: connecting with ivey alumnus just got easier
body: a message from doug speer mba ceo of emco limited and chair of the ivey alumnus association board dear john i am writing today to introduce an exciting new initiative from the advancement department at the ivey business school in conjunction with the ivey alumnus association board that will benefit all member of the ivey community it our new on line service called ezone collaboration is the hallmark of an ivey business school education ezone offer u the ability to collaborate with member of one of the premier association of business leader in the world the ivey alumnus network a little further below you will see the address for the website and the username and password that you need to log in connect with classmate my community is where well be able to have online discussion share idea and build relationship with classmate and other member of the ivey community send a request for a new community to ivey advancement today build your network turn to my directory to locate a classmate or other member of the ivey alumnus network or to find out how to contact a member of ivey faculty or staff for the first time ezone brings together all member of the ivey community alumnus student faculty and staff manage your career click on my career to post a resume to view online job posting targeted to ivey alumnus and to link to global workplace a unique service open only to alumnus from many of the world premier business school global workplace give you access to a worldwide database of senior executive appointment and automatic notification of relevant opportunity read the news from an ivey perspective on the ezone homepage take note of ivey in the news there you will find link to article about ivey alumnus and the school that have appeared in the medium and see which of your classmate ha been appointed to a new position update your contact information community is not something we can take for granted with the job market facing such uncertainty it is very important for ivey alumnus to be able to contact and network with one another take a minute today to update your particular by clicking on my information in the upper right hand portion of the screen and dont forget to check the box beside publish of course you control what information other member of the ivey network can view about you but well all benefit from a robust alumnus directory take a few moment and look at ezone today navigate to httpwwwiveyuwocaezone and use your username and password to start to benefit from this excellent site username jlavoratohba password joh sincerely doug speer

subject: how are you
body: sara thanks for your note and sorry that i havent called recently i have joined some day time tennis league at our club and between that charles arthur etc life ha been fairly hectic i keep trying to pick a good day to come up to the office but so far have not found a day that work for both bill and i but hopefully ill see everyone soon by the way you and anyone else in the group are always welcome to come out here i know that it is far and that you all are busy but feel free to plan something if you want how are the legal assistant and the rest of the group how are you doing i must say that i am enjoying my time away from the office charles is doing great he is now pound ounce and allot inch he is growing like a weed and eats often which keep me busy round the clock although he ha started to sleep some more at night we are slowly but surely getting into a routine with him and i feel blessed to have bill here to help it hard to believe that month ha already gone by time fly when you are having fun anyway hang in there and keep me posted say hi to mike for me and if he ever want to play some tennis please call u carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: checking in
body: suzanne just checking in with you im really looking forward to next weekend and i really appreciate you volunteering to bring dessert that wa really sweet of you how are thing everyone here is doing great believe it or not im playing alot of tennis and enjoying it very much there are league at our club almost every morning and with bill at home it ha given me the opportunity to get out of the house and play with the girl which is alot of fun for me and is helping me get back into shape i hate to admit it but between playing tennis and doing some volunteer stuff at arthur school i could actually get used to this sat at home stuff although i still really miss my work and it going to be a tough decision when i have to make it in a few month charles is doing great wait until you see how much he ha grown i cant wait for my parent visit i just wish that they would stay longer alos dont be bashful about stopping by here when you are in the neighborhood the only bad time are after at night charles get pretty cranky around that time and we are working on trying to get him to sleep more during the day part of that is our fault for being out of the house so often during the day but i need to get out otherwise i would go crazy for sure before i forget do you remember packing my gym bag and if so is that something that you can retrieve easily and bring with you next sunday some of my tennis short are in there and if there is a way for you to find it taht would be great well ive got to go take care carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: meeting with mark haedicke
body: mark i wanted to let you know that i did meet with mark haedicke last week to discus my work situation and in particular coming back on a parttime basis sometime in january i think that he wa okay with what i proposed which is to work approx hour a week on a day week i would like your input on which day you would prefer i take off a my initial thought wa friday but im open to suggestion on that i think that the next step is for the of u to meet to discus what my role in the group will be and in particular what work area i will be responsible for i will try to set something up in the next few week i alos had lunch with mary and sara and wa encouraged with what i heard from them we talked about the possibility of having a group offsite meeting in early january to talk about group goal work assignmentsareas of responsibility for each attorney etc what do you think about that idea a i mentioned to you at our lunch i need some direction a to what my responsibility will be when i return to the group and given the fact that we have acquired more people and more work area it seems like some planning and discussion a to who is responsible for what work is in order let me know what you think take care carol

subject: lunch
body: mark im looking forward to seeing you on the st and getting somewhat caught up i thought that it might be helpful to you to let you know what i have been thinking about in term of work although i would ask that you keep this confidential until we have had a chance to talk further and make some decision first if i do return to work it will not be until sometime in january and you and i can talk about a date that make sense i think that this is consistent with what we had talked about before i left second i would like for you to give some thought to the idea of me working parttime for a period of time bill and i have talked about this alot and i feel that i need some time at the outset to make the transition from what i have been doing to going back to work we can discus further what this mean but i really feel that it would not be good for me or my family for me to start off working full time next i would like to talk with you about what my responsibility would be in the swap group if i return and have a clearer understanding of the area in which you would want me to work particularly now that we have more people i know that alot of chnages have occurred in the last few month and im hoping that there are specific work area that i could devote my attention to those are my thought for now a for my office i really dont care where it is or how large it is so just do what you need to do i hope that you are doing well and im really looking forward to seeing you i will bring picture of charles he is doing great take care carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: surety bond
body: prior to our meeting i wanted to explain some of the background to what we are attempting to do here since surety company can not issue bond in the form of financial guarantee we have worked with our surety company so that they feel comfortable that the bond do not fit this category our surety have agreed to issue bond a a partial guarantee to individual confirmation letter there will be separate bond for each individual confirmation letterthe bond will run for an annual term or in the case of fireman fund up to a two year term we worked with the surety to develop a bond form that would specifically tie back into individual confirmation letter so a to enable the surety to approve the bond a a performance guarantee based on the guarantee of the actual supply of power not a financial guarantee and to carve the individual confirmation letter out of the master power purchase contract this wa done because the surety were unwilling andor unable to bond the master power purchase agreement due to it language and extremely broad scopethe individual transaction that were to be bonded each had specific performance obligation and we planned to bond each of these transaction individually the surety have approved the form of bond that we had provided and we would like to keep change to the bond form itself to a minimum if you see any issue with the above please give me a call before today thanks janet k greene reliant resource inc louisiana suite houston tx fax

subject: so ya wan na be a ferc lawyer part ii
body: part ii ferc writing handbook wherefore premise considered add a note of authority to your pleading in fact some administrative law judge will throw your pleading into the special incinerator marked nonconforming pleading located on the west side of the ferc building unless such language is present pronoun should be used sparingly if at all with few exception party must always be named to avoid confusion even if it mean the name of the party will appear several time in one sentence the verb request may not be used without the word to example pipeline x respectfully request the commission to grant it motion in regard to or visavia sound more intelligent than about or concerning if you are not sure youve conveyed an important point effectively repeat the statement verbatim at various other point in your pleading for emphasis additionally repeating a contractual provision several time in a contract will give your client greater right than if you only include the provision once always recite the entire history of the proceeding in your pleading before stating the purpose of your pleading no ferc staffer ever remembers what happens and the added page will make your pleading really impressive when in doubt insert more comma

subject: td waterhouse ipo center is accepting conditional offer
body: td waterhouse is now accepting conditional offer to purchase share of carolina group loews corp which is expected to price on to read the preliminary prospectus filed with the sec and place a conditional offer follow these step login to your account click on trading ipo center ipo offering in the list of current offering select the offering you want and then click on the continue button important information reaffirming your conditional offer once the registration statement is declared effective by the sec we will contact you via email to notify you of the effectiveness of the registration statement and the price a determined by the managing underwriter this normally occurs on the day prior to the first day of trading if you still wish to participate you will be required to respond to u by am et of the following business day to reaffirm your previously submitted conditional offer please note that the email notification will likely be sent after the market close please ensure that you have provided an email address that you are able to access after that time you may change your email address at anytime via the update email function within the ipo center if it is not possible to check your email after market hour you may reaffirm your conditional offer following effectiveness by going to the ipo order status within the ipo center choosing the conditional offer you want to reaffirm and clicking reaffirm conditional offer if you fail to reaffirm your conditional offer within the specified period your conditional offer will automatically be cancelled conditional offer are accepted once reaffirmed at the offering price determined by the managing underwriter after the registration statement becomes effective please note that reaffirming a conditional offer doe not guarantee an allocation of share thank you td waterhouse investor service inc member nyse sipc

subject: career opportunity manager of compliance reporting and analysis
body: dear alumnus countrywide home loan in calabasas ca is seeking a manager of compliance reporting and analysis interested candidate please respond to contact information listed following job description thank you countrywide home loan career opportunity job title manager of compliance reporting and analysis job description and qualification countrywide home loan inc nyse ccr together with it subsidiary is a fortune billion nationwide financial service company a the nation leading independent residential mortgage lender were recognized a an innovator of new financial product and service we have an excellent opportunity at our corporate office in calabasas ca located in northern san fernando valley this position reporting directly to the chief compliance officer a managing director requires candidate to have strong quantitative and analytical skill in addition to motivational aptitude and leadership ability the candidate selected for the job will be in charge of developing new compliance report a well a consolidating existing one based on this analysis the manager of compliance reporting and analysis will recommend and implement solution to current problem and design process to prevent future problem from occurring through presentation to the cco and other executivelevel officer and contact with all division of the company this position provides exposure at the highest level countrywide ha declared the development of a continuous improvement culture to be one of it top strategic initiative the manager of compliance reporting and analysis will carry this mission forward by developing creative solution to compliance issue and designing process to continually improve compliance performance due to the high level exposure that this position provides numerous opportunity exist for career advancement within the company required skill experience with business process and operation analysis solid quantitative and analytical experience thorough knowledge of financial statement excellent knowledge of microsoft excel and access strong verbal and written communication skill must be resourceful innovative entrepreneurial and a proven problem solver selfstarter must be comfortable working with little direction eager to learn from experienced senior corporate executive mba competitive salary and full benefit medical dental disability k stock option pension plan etc commensurate with qualification for immediate consideration please submit your resume with salary history to countrywide home loan inc attn ari qutami park granada m ch calabasas ca fax or email no relocation offered eoe mfdv principal only _________________________________________________ mba career management center the anderson school at ucla entrepreneur hall c phone email web httpwwwandersonuclaedu

subject: elektro weekly update
body: attached is the elektro weekly report a well a a summary update of the rationing action plan and state of affair although it is portuguese it give you an idea of the effort that is going into the detailed planning and implementation the last two week were continuous negotiation with the government regarding rationing implementation measure including drafting provisory measure that have force of law a well a resolution to implement them i have met on a daily basis with minister parente in brasilia and we continue to lead the sector effort advocating our right under the concession contract a well a the initial contract signed with the government owned generator sergio assad is focusing on the implementation and legal aspect of the measure joo carlos is focusing on the mae energy market intervention and energy contract on friday i met with pedro malan minister of fazenda brasil most powerfull minister and possible presidential candidate in the election to discus enrons and sector position regarding the current situation and solution for the path forward on monday i am meeting with arminio fraga central bank president and in a separate meeting with octavio castello branco bndes brazilian national development bank director who is heading the multiministerial task force focused on resolving pending issue regarding the thermal expansion program in all these meeting we are discussing the cuiaba situation a well a our other project and investment possibility stressing the necessary solution to our existing issue a a condition precedent to further investment the government ha given this agenda top priority especially due to the politicaleconomic implication and the presidential election in which will be in serious jeopardy for the president party if the power shortage extend into next year we are focusing on implementing measure that protect our investment and create condition for a competitive energy market i will keep updating a we progress notcias do racionamento maiodoc weekly report may thppt

subject: denver plachy
body: january dear john lavorato hunter shively andy lewis and chris gaskill i regret to inform you that i will be resigning from the new enronubs warburg venture and will await further direction in the effort to fulfill my current obligation it is definitely with a bit of sadness that i have arrived at the conclusion to leave the new enronubs warburg venture but i believe that it is in the best interest of my young career in addition after signing a ubs offer letter i have realized over the last two day that given my current assignment it would be very difficult for me to continue to be motivated and to produce in the manner that would please both management and myself therefore i believe it is in the best interest of both party that i leave the new enronubs warburg venture although this decision wa not an easy one for me to make i have decided to pursue other opportunity i am extremely grateful for the opportunity i have been given here in this organization and for the investment that both you a individual and the organization a a whole have made in my personal career development i believe i have worked hard at enron and i trust that i made significant value adding contribution it is because of my experience here and the tutelage that all of you have given me that i have my current knowledge and opportunity i am very grateful for all of my experience here at enronubs warburg and i would like to personally thank all of you guy upon your return from connecticut i will also make a concerted effort to maintain contact with all of you ubs warburg energy will certainly be a successful organization and i wish you all the best of luck with the exciting challenge of rebuilding this great business i await your direction upon receiving my intention to resign and i offer my service in order to make the process a smooth a possible sincerely denver plachy

body: the potential use of biological agent such a anthrax in a terrorist attack continues to raise concern worldwide here at enron the mail center and business controlscorporate security have already implemented safeguard so that all mail entering the enron building will be screened in accordance with procedure for identifying suspicious package we are also in touch with the u postal service and the center for disease control to ensure we have the most complete and uptodate guidance for handling any possible anthrax exposure however should you receive an envelope or package that you do not feel comfortable opening please contact corporate security at extension and we will screen it again to provide enron employee with a better understanding of anthrax and the potential danger it pose we have posted a bulletin on the corporate security intranet site httphomeenroncomsecurity_bull_html that includes link to the cdc and usps resource

subject: update reporting to work next week
body: many of you have asked whether you should come into the office next week especially if there is no guarantee of being paid for time worked after today we want to encourage you to come to work we continue to consider every option available to u a a company and unfortunately restructuring through bankruptcy is one of those option your continued effort during these trying time are critical to the company a we go through this decision making process i still can not say with certainty if or when we will file for bankruptcy but you should be aware that in general the bankruptcy code provides protection for employee salary and wage earned within day of a petition filing to the extent of per employee i want you to know that if we file a bankruptcy petition we intend to seek approval by the bankruptcy court to exercise that protection immediately and pay you for your time worked prior to any petition filing according to our regular payroll practice additionally enron would be obligated and will pay salary and wage earned after a bankruptcy filing for enron where our value is directly tied to our employee making sure that we meet these obligation will be a high priority we are continuing to evaluate the ongoing resource need of the company for each potential option we might pursue of course until we finalize those business decision we can not make that determination i know that this prolonged process is agonizing for you i can only continue to assure you that we will notify you of your employment status a soon a we are able to do so while terminated employee will tap into their own network of contact a they look for new employment we hope to do what we can to assist them we will tap into the contact we have a a company to aid terminated employee in their job search we have already been in touch with several employer and many are interested in enron alumnus we will share more information on these effort soon i appreciate your continued patience and cooperation ken

subject: re rebuttal
body: confused what are you disagreeing with me in regard to demand destruction jennifer on am john cc rebuttal i am definitely a bigger fan of the crude complex for the next few month agree the defcon bubble ha burst for natgas disagree about the demand destruction i think some demand is just permanently gone i cheaper btu in asia pacific and plant just wont run here anymore but i think that we are underestimating the structural change in energy demand just a the economy is le dependent on heavy industry for it health energy demand is changing since just about everyone missed the boat on the increased power demand a a result of silicon valley i think we dont have a good handle on what the driver of the new power generation really areso what im saying is that industrial demand will weaken demand in service based industry will increase also energy is a much smaller component of the cost structure in service industry also i think in people had sticker shock they couldnt have imagined gas but now that volatility and higher price are firmly entrenched in their mind they will find way of running their factory also they will budget for these price instead of see ng week nevada power price hike affecting casino increase of when asked the implication for missed earnings and their plan for demand conservation one casino official replied were in the bright light business i dont believe the economic doom and gloom first of all no one want a repeat of the recession which wa much worse outside of the u every central bank in the g ha or will cut rate this week the u will follow suit or it will have a very expensive dollar which will blow export with all of the monetary slack consumer credit will not tighten and thus buying will continue witness the lack of destruction in big ticket item purchasing heavy manufacturing is contracting but this is not everything productivity gain are strong the economy is becoming more service based and traditional industrial barometer are not telling the whole story finally i am london and it is not doom and gloom over here well there my cent jen fraser enron global market fundamental

subject: how are you
body: mark sorry i havent called or written in quite some time but im in my own little world here at home thing are going very well here charles will be almost month old and i cant believe how much he ha grown we finally have established a day and night routine for him and im happy to report that im starting to get more sleep which is nice im still running and playing alot of tennis which ha helped me keep my sanity i have really enjoyed my stay at home it nice to be able to watch your kid grow up and both arthur and charles i think have really benefitted from u both being home with them i feel very fortunate i would really like to have lunch with you in the next few week so that i can catch up on what ha been going on and begin discussing with you my thought about returning to work it something that i havent given too much thought to but need to a the end of the year approach here are some good date for me november th th th st nd let me know waht work for you sorry that i havent brought charles up to see everyone but with all that we have going on here it hard to find the time to make the trip into down town look forward to hearing from you carol

subject: winecommune fee update
body: october dear winecommune member the winecommune community ha grown over the past three year from an informal message board for buying and selling wine to an impressive worldwide exchange with a user base of over member since we have been proud to offer you free membership and nocost usership winecommune now ha the second largest membership base and it is the third largest internet wine auction company by volume we have built a business that is secure and reputable with a client base of loyal user whose participation and feedback have helped u become what we are today we want to go further and provide you with an even better place on the internet to buy and sell wine we want to add more feature make the site faster and make it more secure in order to do that however we have to begin charging a modest commission beginning with lot posted on monday november seller will be charged a commission for all successful auction bidding and buying will remain free fee only apply to the seller the new fee are the lowest in the wine auction industry online or offline other wine auction charge a much a to the buyer and to the seller what are we going to do with the commission over the next several month look for the following new service increased advertising to attract new member enhanced customer service platinum seller program a way to reward seller with proven track record greater protection for buyer new way to buy and sell we believe the new charge to seller is competitive and fair and hope you agree with this change we are committed to providing you with the fastest and easiest method for selling and buying wine please continue to provide u with comment and suggestion on way of enhancing our service we value your membership and are grateful for your continued patronage and support thank you for helping u make winecommune the wine auction community if you have any question do not hesitate to contact u at the winecommune staff

subject: program change
body: a you know this is an unprecedented time in enrons history we must adapt our employee program to fit the immediate need of our company during this time of transition it is especially difficult to announce the immediate suspension of the following program clickathome enron ha suspended the clickathome program the program will no longer accept new participant pc order or internet service order order submitted and confirmed prior to november will be honored enron will also discontinue subsidized internet service effective january employee who are currently subscriber to subsidized internet service will be switched to the regular commercial rate of their service provider and be responsible for the entire cost of the service matching gift and volunteer incentive program vip enrons matching gift program and vip grant have been suspended indefinitely a we consider the immediate need of all employee during this trying time it is appropriate that we discontinue the dollar for dollar match for charitable contribution a well a cash donation recognizing employee volunteer hour with nonprofit organization matching gift or vip submission received prior to november will be honored we regret that we have had to make these change we must continue to look for way to reduce operating expense through this transition period

subject: increasing eol liquidity in west basis
