subject: westlb transaction
body: john the attached is a summary by greg of the financining for the turbine purchased from new brunswick power in summary ecc pay the bank west lb directly in three installment under an offbalance sheet lease financing arrangement the first installment of u mm wa made dec the next installment is due feb of u mm and the third installment is due roughly march of u mm the drag on the financing is that west lb through whom ena structure it offbalance sheet turbine financing is not a canadian resident for tax purpose and therefore is not tax efficient to ecc in that there is a withholding tax payment on the interest not principal component of each leasefinancing payment an offbalance sheet financing with a canadian resident financial institution would eliminate this tax inefficiency and this is what i wa referring to when i indicated some work may still be required to restructure the turbine financing the withholding tax if we keep this structure will total roughly c over all of the leasefinancing payment chris calger ha the exact figure any decision to change the structure should have regard to these cost and the transaction cost and fee associated with finding a new canadian resident offbalance sheet lender in addition if we decide to keep the turbine or sell or transfer the turbine to ena or a third party depending on commercially what it is we decide to do with them additional work may be required to take title to the turbine or to assignrestructure the west lb financing and the new brunswick power purchase agreement i am confident that the bulk of commercial legal work for any of these transaction can be handled internally but that the tax legal work may require the input of outside counsel we are also obligated to pay gst but this is ultimately reimbursed through the lease financing althoguh there is a time value of money component that is not recovered from the time gst is paid and when the gst rebate is made

subject: mid market power formena change
body: carol i have attempted to incorporate the change that jim ha incorporated in our long form power agreement which ena ha suggested to date into the short form attached please find a sample short form for the con ed market for your review please note the following a you review the short form do not contain the optionality relating to our performing billing service all of our midmarket form anticipate that we will act a customer billing agent and that we will collect all amount due related to td and the like from the customer and reflect same on our invoice and pas those amount on to the customer utility i did not include a setoff provision in this draft mainly because the vast majority of the time we will not nor will an affiliate have another agreement in place with these customer if you feel strongly about our including a setoff provision we will do so the change in law provision read a bit differently from the long form the thinking here is that the long form language is very lengthy and rather harsh and weve had great difficulty selling it in the past taking into consideration this class of customer we decided to include certain item including our inability to cover our cost due to a change in law rule or practice a a force majeure event in an effort to soften the approach see the gtcs also we do not address calculation of a termination payment in the event of a change in law a the long form doe again more in the interest of saving space than anything else let u know your thought on this document and if you are comfortable with our using this until such time a the hybrid form is launched if you are comfortable we will drive these change into our other midmarket power form thanks again for your help with this project marianne p please be sure to copy sarah dietrich and jennifer hillegonds on your response they will be taking this project during my hiatus i am moving to pa on friday of this week and will be out of pocket through approximately i will start up again in midjuly

subject: dresdner bank credit issue
body: rod the following are the credit issue that they raised in their comment cross default threshold instead of they want a of equity test credit event upon merger they want to delete the amendment language in our schedule mac trigger this currently is an event of default they want to make it a termination event also they want to add to the trigger going below a baa rating by moody in the financial reporting section they want to add on our side a requirement that we deliver to them any financial or business report that we make available to our shareholder or that we file with the sec or bank regulatory authority in the netting language they have excluded fx and currency option transaction in the setoff language they have limited the trigger to the designation of an early termination date because of the termination event credit event upon merger alos they want setoff to apply to matured and unmatured obligation they dont want a cap on the enron guaranty in the termination section where we specify loss and second method that have an interesting rider insert that modifies how the second method work im still trying to understand what this language doe but it appears to qualify any payment on termination that the nondefaulting party would have to make to the defaulting party i will send you a copy of their comment and hopefully we will talk to them about this next week carol

subject: re rebuttal
body: confused what are you disagreeing with me in regard to demand destruction jennifer on am john cc rebuttal i am definitely a bigger fan of the crude complex for the next few month agree the defcon bubble ha burst for natgas disagree about the demand destruction i think some demand is just permanently gone i cheaper btu in asia pacific and plant just wont run here anymore but i think that we are underestimating the structural change in energy demand just a the economy is le dependent on heavy industry for it health energy demand is changing since just about everyone missed the boat on the increased power demand a a result of silicon valley i think we dont have a good handle on what the driver of the new power generation really areso what im saying is that industrial demand will weaken demand in service based industry will increase also energy is a much smaller component of the cost structure in service industry also i think in people had sticker shock they couldnt have imagined gas but now that volatility and higher price are firmly entrenched in their mind they will find way of running their factory also they will budget for these price instead of see ng week nevada power price hike affecting casino increase of when asked the implication for missed earnings and their plan for demand conservation one casino official replied were in the bright light business i dont believe the economic doom and gloom first of all no one want a repeat of the recession which wa much worse outside of the u every central bank in the g ha or will cut rate this week the u will follow suit or it will have a very expensive dollar which will blow export with all of the monetary slack consumer credit will not tighten and thus buying will continue witness the lack of destruction in big ticket item purchasing heavy manufacturing is contracting but this is not everything productivity gain are strong the economy is becoming more service based and traditional industrial barometer are not telling the whole story finally i am london and it is not doom and gloom over here well there my cent jen fraser enron global market fundamental

subject: isda tax issue
body: rhett you may recall a few week ago i asked you about some language that one of our counterparties wanted a an amendment to the term indemnifiable tax another counterparty deutsche bank ha requested the following which i think is very similar to what we were looking at before notwithstanding the foregoing indemnifiabletax also mean any tax imposed by reason of a change in tax law by a government or taxing authority of a relevant jurisdiction of the payer unless the payee is incorporated organized managed and controlled or considered to have it seat in such jurisdiction or is acting for purpose of this agreement through a branch or office located in such jurisdiction in the isda user guide they explain that the effect of this language is to eliminate the payee risk of bearing new tax imposed by the payer jurisdiction even if the payee activity in such jurisdiction is the basis for such tax except if the circumstance in the definition occur it thus result in the payer having to gross up for such tax do you think that we can or should accept this carol st clair eb phone fax

subject: nmed compliance order
body: privileged confidential attorney client communication i just spoke with mr charles de saillan asst general counsel for the nmed concerning the referenced compliance order apparently the nmed mailed out of these order last week the nm legislature ha adopted a statute of limitation under the nm air quality act and the nmed wa acting to attempt to foreclose the use of this defense dave can mary hunt this new legislation down the language in the order assessing a penalty per day of violation is standard language when the nmed ha not assessed a specific figure it will be a couple of week before the nmed will be able to provide u a specific penalty we discussed settlement and the administrative hearing process a settlement meeting is not likely to take place soon due to the nmeds workload we need to have a number from the nmed before the settlement conference anyway we will have to file the request to go to hearing no later tahn july th however charlie stated that if the respondent evidenced good faith to achieve a settlement the secretary had the discretion to allow additional time to submit a full answer where we provided all of the detail of our defense i told charlie we would be organizing ourselves internally and that we would get back to him with some proposed date for a settlement conference a request for hearing and a request to extend the time in which to file an answer preferably tied to after the settlement conference let see about date and dave or i will call the nmed and submit a letter with the three item above we want to make sure that the nmed ha time before the end of the day period to respond to our request for an extension on the answer

subject: ibuyit account payable approval process
body: on may st ibuyit payable will be activated for all organization support ed by the houstonbased account payable processing center the purpose of th is message is to explain the ibuyit payable invoice review and approval proce s and to ask your help in defining and communicating the limit of authority within your business unit how ibuyit work the may st introduction of ibuyit payable will initially have the flexibility to administer any invoice reviewapproval process however in the near future it will also be able to enforce the reviewapproval process therefore until the enforcement functionality is activated the project tea m is instructing ibuyit payable user to continue to follow the current invoi ce review and approval guideline of their business unit the following step outline the ibuyit payable invoice reviewapproval process the coder will selfdirect the invoice to the appropriate reviewerapprover according to business unit guideline if the reviewerapprover ha the authority to approve the invoice according to their business unit guideline they validate the coding and approve the invoice for payment if the reviewerapprover doe not have the authority to approve the invoice according to their business unit guideline they selfdirect the invoice to the appropriate person for approval we need your help for an effective introduction of ibuyit payable it is important that each business unit ha a clearly defined release strategy if you do not currently have a release strategy in place it is important that one is defined a soon a possible once the release strategy ha been defined for your business unit i encourage you to communicate it to your organization so that ibuyit payable s user can appropriately route invoice for review and approval attached i s a template to assist you in communicating this information in addition please submit your release strategy to me by thursday april so that the project team can work to enhance ibuyit payable ability to function a an enforcement tool i am dedicated to ensuring that ibuyit payable tool meet your control need please do not hesitate to contact me with any question thank you john gillespie

subject: lng to california
body: john following up on yesterday there are two additional consideration first with regard to the idea of curtailing gas input at the topock liquefaction plant the pipeline bottleneck is actually downstream of the plant so that wouldnt help second it seems there are more of these portable pipeline unit floating around than i thought besides the inoperable unit in amarillo both transgas in massachusetts and minnigasco may have at least one moreover pge ha one at the end of a long lateral line on it system just south of sacramento apparently it us it mostly to augment linepack the spec of that unit are about time higher than the amarillo one it put out cubic feethour about mmcfd or almost one contract at psi a i said yesterday these unit are the only way that you could get gas into the pipeline system in california this information i got from jeff beale who run chiv a smallscale lng consultant he said that hed had some similar call about lng and also that hed be willing to help enron source equipment if we were really interested in looking further into transporting lng into california assuming that we could get a few portable pipeline and some truck there are five liquefaction plant that could most conveniently supply lng location owner liquefaction capacity galday capacity mmcfd storage gal storage mmcf topock az elpasoalt laplata co williams sacramento labarge wy exxon evanston wy amoco total whether these plant have spare lng to sell u is another question the sacramento plant which i mentioned yesterday is supposedly dedicated to providing methane for laboratory purpose the others may have contract with lng fleet owner ill check back with you later today about the outcome of your meeting

subject: update reporting to work next week
body: many of you have asked whether you should come into the office next week especially if there is no guarantee of being paid for time worked after today we want to encourage you to come to work we continue to consider every option available to u a a company and unfortunately restructuring through bankruptcy is one of those option your continued effort during these trying time are critical to the company a we go through this decision making process i still can not say with certainty if or when we will file for bankruptcy but you should be aware that in general the bankruptcy code provides protection for employee salary and wage earned within day of a petition filing to the extent of per employee i want you to know that if we file a bankruptcy petition we intend to seek approval by the bankruptcy court to exercise that protection immediately and pay you for your time worked prior to any petition filing according to our regular payroll practice additionally enron would be obligated and will pay salary and wage earned after a bankruptcy filing for enron where our value is directly tied to our employee making sure that we meet these obligation will be a high priority we are continuing to evaluate the ongoing resource need of the company for each potential option we might pursue of course until we finalize those business decision we can not make that determination i know that this prolonged process is agonizing for you i can only continue to assure you that we will notify you of your employment status a soon a we are able to do so while terminated employee will tap into their own network of contact a they look for new employment we hope to do what we can to assist them we will tap into the contact we have a a company to aid terminated employee in their job search we have already been in touch with several employer and many are interested in enron alumnus we will share more information on these effort soon i appreciate your continued patience and cooperation ken

subject: just in case i go into labour these are my current thought on el
body: prepared in contemplation of litigation attorney client privilege there appears to be no succinct way to write down my thought on where we are with el paso but im going to try assumption kilgores objective maintain prm accounting treatment for the swap outcome of lawsuit game over for kilgore if his accountant disagree with the current prm treatment and move it to debt thus affecting his ratio and revolver what do we want i to be certain of payment how important is this really pretty important but what is this worth is cash term we clearly are in a position whereby if el paso evers transfer the contract to an entity which default on payment we are exposed however realistically what are the chance of them defaulting very low and would we win that in court yes ii to monetize the contract secondary concern with a value to enron of m there are potential way that we could monetize the contract without disclosing the contract joe is working on these if there is a way we can do this then our downside from this confidentiality issue is much smaller a it would cost u more to monetize thereby bringing in le gain probably not much of a difference but can we get the asset off the book we are pursuing how far we can get in term of true sale treatment with ve they will give joe a view on wednesday there are potential other way we can ensure this is off our credit if we sue them loss of leverage we potentially open up the issue to a much wider audience and potentially affect kilgores accounting treatment the one thing he want so our leverage ha disappeared a we are no longer able to maintain the one thing kilgore is looking for way forward we should continue to pursue a commercial solution to the payment issue and monetize the contract through a secondary route if we complete monetization through another route then we are exposed to nonpayment which could be perceived a very low risk we have potentially a one year exposure on the back end based on six year statute of limitation if we can not get a way forward on the monetization then rereview the way forward we are at risk of them suing u over the confidentiality breach and that would be in new york good luck prepared in contemplation of litigation attorney client privilege

subject: organizational change
body: change in enrons business require u to reevaluate how we approach the engineering and construction function within enron specifically enron energy service ee business ha grown dramatically and that requires considerable additional engineering and construction resource both to develop solution for customer and to deliver those solution to customer additionally in light of enrons continued emphasis on increasing our return on invested capital we have been engaged in fewer large scale construction project around the world historically these project have been a primary focus of eeccs activity consequently we are making the following organizational change concerning eecc eeccs pipeline construction group led by jerry martin will become part of enron transportation service nepco will continue to operate a a stand alone entity focused on power plant construction service to enron entity and third party the remainder of eecc will become part of ee larry izzo will report to the ee office of the chairman these change will better align our intellectual capital with the growth opportunity within enron and provide new and exciting opportunity for our employee please join u in supporting and implementing these change

subject: natural gas origination
body: our natural gas business continues to benefit from effective account management and resource allocation focused on identifying and responding to the need of our varied customer in order to keep our organization optimally structured and to facilitate additional growth we are making the following change producerwellhead group the current midmarket origination and wellhead pricing activity currently within the central and eastern gas region will be consolidated with the derivative group under fred lagrasta this will create a single business unit focused upon the need of the producing industry within the eastern u the producer focus in the western u and texas will remain unchanged reporting to mark whitt and brian redmond respectively strategic asset development laura luce will move from her role in the central region to lead an effort focused strictly on identifying and entering into longterm strategic arrangement within the central and eastern region this initiative will focus on a limited number of selected market that provide strategic opportunity for partnering in asset development asset management and optimization this effort will continue to work very closely with the regional lead central origination and midmarket frank vickers will continue his current role in the eastern region and will assume the leadership role for midmarket and origination activity in the central region there will be no change to the west and texas origination group headed respectively by barry tycholiz and brian redmond please join u in congratulating fred laura and frank in their new role louise john

subject: holiday party canceled
body: i know that this is a difficult time for all of u with everything going on inside the company a well a in the world around u we have been carefully considering whether a holiday celebration is appropriate this year to be honest employee feedback ha been mixed many viewed the holiday party a a unique opportunity for u to come together a enron employee to share the spirit of the season others felt a holiday party would be improper given the company current circumstance after weighing these point of view we have ultimately decided to cancel the allenron holiday party that wa scheduled for december given what ha transpired over the past month it could be considered imprudent for enron to incur the expense of such an event i regret that this action is necessary because i recognize that your hard work throughout the year merit a holiday celebration and so much more we will attempt to find other more appropriate way to recognize your outstanding contribution a we move into the holiday season ken lay

transaction which require the use of the manlove or mohammad fiel d also known a exchange or enhanced hub service the profit what is profit obviously before tax but otherwise a gaap standard from hub service shall be split a follows for transaction entered into between february through september the profit shall be equally shared for transaction entered into from october to september and successive year until september people will receive the first million in profit cumulative not annual and will enron receive the next million in profit for any profit exceeding million people and enron will share any on a basis this arrangement excludes all agency fee paid to meh these fee will be shared from the inception all internal cost incurred in the normal course of business will be borne by the party incurring same all third party cost will be shared equally and require meh board approval perc peaking agreement perc ha contract with pgl and with nicor contract relating to the ethanepropane peaking facility the two existing contract pay a total of million approximate or exact in demand charge annually any profit exceeding million in a year will be shared by people and enron subject: var
body: this memo follows up on our discussion this morning with respect to the million of increased var that the board allocated to rick buy and jeff skilling i propose the following million be allocated to ee and therefore remove ee position from the wholesale gas and power group this ha already been done move the control and decision making of million of var each to the trading head of north america lavorato and europe sherriff with respect to north america i intend to create a group called the cross commodity trading group which will warehouse the million of var and use it a it see fit i will run this group and currently be the only employee this will start out a an administrative structure to use if we need to throw more var at certain position i see the individual trading group staying within their var limit however i do see the need for a true cross commodity group that would search for low risk high probability trade accross the commodity that we trade this structure may help to start u down this path please let me know what you think john

body: a many of you know i have a provision in my employment contract which provides for a payment of million per year for the remaining term of my contract in the event of a change of control of enron the merger with dynegy or a similar transaction with any other company would trigger this provision on closing assuming the merger with dynegy is closed within month a we expect this provision would entitle me to total payment of slightly more than million many ceo have change of control provision in their employment contract and mine ha been in place since but given the current circumstance facing the company and our employee i have been giving a lot of thought these last few day to what to do about this payment initially i thought i would use part of the fund for a foundation for our employee and take the remainder in stock and cash however after talking to a number of employee this afternoon i have decided that the best course of action would be for me to waive my right to any of this payment therefore at closing i will receive no payment under this provision i know this action doe not remedy the uncertainty that you and your family face but please know that i will continue to do everything in my power to serve the best interest of enrons employee and shareholder i am still very proud of what we have built at enron and i want to continue working with all of you to correct the problem and restore enron to it rightful place in the energy industry thank you

subject: dr burgess
body: sam here is a little something about my grandfather dr walter herschel burgess wa a graduate of alabama polytechnic institute now auburn university he practied vetinary medicine for year in haleyville alabama dr burgess wa blessed with child grandchild and one great grandchild dr burgess wa an avid golfer and tremendous football fan he held auburn football season ticket for year dr burgess recently received the golden eagle from auburn university in recognition of year of alumnus service dr burgess wa a world war ii veteran dr burgess loved auburn and sent all three of his child and both grandchild to school on the plain due to his love for auburn that he instilled in his family there will definitely be a forth generation auburn graduate in the burgess family dr burgess wa also a proud member of the ots vetinary fraternity at auburn university dr burgess wa born in cullman county alabama and wa a year resident of haleyville alabama please feel free to take some liberty and rearrange or omit some of the thing i stated above thanks again sam for all of your help with this and the recognition this newsletter will give my grandfather auburn is very fortunate to have such a great person raising money for the most important school within the university talk to you soon pl

subject: broadband solution architect
body: jennifer mike rabon had just forwarded to me this helpful synopsis of the opportunity with kinkos a he see it i would like to forward this on to james thompson to assist him in targeting the right person for u to work with and cc mike rabon is this a good idea to forward on the email or is it overkill given the email i sent yesterday second could i mention gary king mike rabons kinkos contact in the email thanks for your suggestion sj mr thompson here are several touchpoints identified by mike rabon the enron broadband service originator which may facilitate your finding the appropriate broadband solution architect at kinkos you may recall having met mike rabon in the october th meeting kinkos ha an ip network today with access to all branch kinkos had expressed the need to add more hub to that network and make some change to it in the spring time frame enrons goal would be to make a need assessment for the desired structure that kinkos would like to see a it pertains subject: how are you
body: julia i thought that it would be easier to email you since we keep missing each other on the phone all of the st clairs are doing well charles keep growing at his last visit last week he wa pound and inch needle to say he like to eat he is gradually starting to sleep more at night but is still pretty unpredictable and ive just gotten used to not getting alot of sleep having bill home with me is a big help and it make it alot easier for me since we can trade off physically i am feeling almost i started running a few week ago just to keep my sanity and have started playing tennis again although it is going to take a long time for me to get back into playing shape arthur is very much into tennis and i am enjoying getting to watch him play he played in his first tournament over the weekend and did very well bill and i are hoping that he keep it up he ha been great with the baby a i expected he is a calming influence on him and really interacts well with him i feel very very fortunate how are you doing and how are the boy i miss work and the interaction with everyone but at the same time i am enjoying my time at home i think that you know how i must feel and im glad that i still have some time to think about it i cant imagine having to go back after week a i am just beginning to feel good physically carol st clair arthur is back in school and is a big help at home im enjoying being home with him when he get home from school and it nice to be able to visit him while he is in school i hope that you are doing well and not killing yourself up there how are your parent doing please give them my best i keep promising to come up for a visit and i will soon tomorrow thursday may be a possibility hope to see you soon take care carol

subject: california update 51601
body: executive summary of the four plan b introduced recently by california legislature only two proposal appear viable for socal and surprisingly pge the others either establish vulture fund for when so cal go under or propose new way of funding the transmission line deal the california legislature inability to identify an immediate solution ha cued the medium to limit the publicity of the lesser plan b at this point socal is interested in a making a deal not only are they are the on the verge of bankruptcy but unlike pge socal ha also significantly exposed it parent company to bankruptcy by not taking the necessary step to protect it asset a reported earlier with pge we are monitoring all activity surrounding socal asset which could signal imminent bankruptcy the infamous plan b four hour of debate and the absence of republican representation on tuesday night led member of the state assembly socalled plan b group to decide backing only legislation introduced by assemblyman dean florez and joe nation a previous proposal by senate president pro tem john burton that poised the state to purchase socals transmission line for b to service debt and left the ca puc to determine socals unrecovered power cost prior to bond issuance didntt win support a reported earlier source indicate that davis mou is likely to suffer a similar fate once introduced by senator polanco later this week the florez plan florezs plan is currently under review in the assembly energy committee the proposal allows pge to issue bond secured by their asset and use the revenue to pay creditor the state would then ass a tax on the bond revenue aimed at servicing pges debt with the cadwr source report one drawback to the plan is that pge bankruptcy judge montali would be required to authorize any such a transaction respective of other recommendation available to the court this may not be the most timeefficient course of action pge had shown sign of approval over similar plan in the month preceding their bankruptcy the nation plan nation plan allows socal ed to sell bond backed by ratepayer revenue generated from state approved rate hike additionally the state would hold a fiveyear option on buying the transmission line for book value roughly b a well a holding to the socal concession previously mentioned in davis mou the drawback to nation proposal is that socal creditor including bank and generator would have to collectively agree to take debt repayment at on the dollar source report that some socal creditor favor attempt to recoup dollar for dollar in bankruptcy court over conceding to a haircut socal reportedly approves of nation plan sticking to the principal outlined in davis mou

body: good morning bottom line no change for the near term we see some cool anomaly arriving into the dakota by monday already with high in the dakota in the mids and low in the midteensby tuesday texas and the midwest will be in the below normal category with dallas overnights in the mids normal low houston low in the mids normal upper and chicago will freeze with a mid overnight progressing into the northeast by wednesday philly and new york will get into the below normal category but or degree anomaly are most likely look like a three day event a it move easterly and then is followed by moderation into the day time period which will see a cool shot over the midwesteast towards next weekend moderating again by early the following week then early in the day time period more cool air move in beginning with central cooling then even into the southeast so with normal dropping across the nation this first cool air anomaly event arriving in the midwest by tuesday will elevate the nation gas demand requirement into the bcfd plus regime from here on through the winter here the strip beginning with today sat bcfd sun bcfd mon bcfd tue bcfd wed bcfd thu bcfd fri bcfd sat bcfd sun bcfd mon bcfd tue bcfd till tomorrow the weather team

subject: whats up
body: suzanne sorry i didnt call you last weekend hows everything at the office is julia back yet i wrote her a card and i hope that over the next few week and month she can grieve and at the same time get on with her life i really feel for her keep me posted on how shes doing what have you and ric been up to charles and arthur are doing great bill mom is here for a visit and we are having alot of fun i had lunch with kristina last week and she updated me on the enron happening seems like every week there is a major organizational announcement where do you think scott sefton will end up she seemed to thing that he might take the compensation package that apparently wa offerred to him it wa good to talk to her and get back in touch with work im still playing alot of tennis and really enjoying it charles is now old enough for the daycare that our tennis club provides so bill and i go out there quite a bit in the morning to hit which is nice i still dont know what my long range plan are and will probably start discussing with bill what to do in the next few week it hard to believe that i have been out for over month time really doe fly by give my best to everyone and write back when you can did stacy have her baby yet carol st clair eb phone fax

body: a we continue to address a number of issue facing enron it is critical that the company remain focused on attracting motivating and retaining a diverse and talented workforce we strongly believe that our workforce is worldclass the best in any industry so we will continue to develop and reward this tremendous talent base because the lasting strength of our company is determined by the strength of our workforce we are elevating the role employeefocused function play within enron we are pleased to announce that effective immediately human resource employee responsibility and executive and corporate compensation will report directly to the office of the chairman david oxley vice president will continue to oversee enrons global hr function the lead hr representative for the individual business unit will report to david in addition to their respective office of the chairman besides managing recruiting staffing training compensation and the performance evaluation process david will also add payroll and labor relation to his list of responsibility cindy olson executive vice president will have responsibility for employee relation and corporate responsibility which includes social responsibility community relation diversity employee relation redeployment alumnus relation employee event and program benefit wellness and worklife mary joyce vice president will continue to have responsibility for executive and corporate compensation in addition to global employee information management and reporting and analysis david cindy and mary will each report to the office of the chairman a detailed organizational chart is attached please join me in congratulating david cindy and mary on their new responsibility httphomeenroncommessaginghrorgchartppt

subject: new stock symbol
body: enron announced today that it common stock will now be traded a an overthecounter otc equity security under the symbol enrnq this follows a decision by the new york stock exchange nyse to file an application to delist enrons common stock which mean that enrons common stock and related security are suspended from trading on the nyse enron is considering whether to appeal the nyse decision the nyse ha standard criterion for listing stock which can be found on their website at wwwnysecom enron recently fell below the following listing criterion average closing price of a security le than over a consecutive tradingday period quotation service for enrons stock will now be provided by the national quotation bureau llc pink sheet
